title: A Goofy Movie
comment_text:
A Goofy Movie

"*Do you need a break from modern livin?*"

movieData.overview: Though Goofy always means well, his amiable cluelessness and klutzy pratfalls regularly embarrass his awkward adolescent son, Max. When Max's lighthearted prank on his high-school principal finally gets his longtime crush, Roxanne, to notice him, he asks her on a date. Max's trouble at school convinces Goofy that he and the boy need to bond over a cross-country fishing trip like the one he took with his dad when he was Max's age, which throws a kink in his son's plans to impress Roxanne.
movieData.tagline: It’s hard to be cool... when your dad’s Goofy.
movieData.title: A Goofy Movie

title: THE MUMMY
comment_text:
THE MUMMY!

Edit: wow thanks for the awards guys! So glad to see so many of you liked it so much!!

movieData.overview: A group of archaeology students awaken an ancient mummy. After being trapped in a time loop, the only way they can escape, is to defeat the mummy. As the body count rises, it seems the Mummy has to collect the souls of those who woke him to be able to walk the earth - for good.
movieData.tagline: Evil has been unearthed.
movieData.title: Rise of the Mummy

title: Constantine
comment_text:
Constantine. 

Didn't get the best ratings but I loved it.

movieData.overview: John Constantine has literally been to Hell and back. When he teams up with a policewoman to solve the mysterious suicide of her twin sister, their investigation takes them through the world of demons and angels that exists beneath the landscape of contemporary Los Angeles.

movieData.tagline: Hell Wants Him, Heaven Won't Take Him, Earth Needs Him.

title: Treasure Planet
comment_text:
Treasure Planet.  Beautiful backgrounds, interesting character designs, seamless blend of 2D and 3D that was way ahead of its time, and a fun melding of past and futuristic. 

It captured my imagination like no other film had or has since.

movieData.overview: When space galleon cabin boy Jim Hawkins discovers a map to an intergalactic "loot of a thousand worlds," a cyborg cook named John Silver teaches him to battle supernovas and space storms. But, soon, Jim realizes Silver is a pirate intent on mutiny!
movieData.tagline: Find your place in the universe.
movieData.title: Treasure Planet

title: The Fall
comment_text:
"The Fall"

Here's the trailer: [https://youtu.be/rEi-v6aJD7Q](https://youtu.be/rEi-v6aJD7Q)

It centers around a Hollywood stuntman and a little girl, both in the same hospital, and the man tells the girl a fantastical story in exchange for something I won't spoil here. The story is great, but the cinematography is *out of this world*. Main character is Lee Pace, the bad guy from Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 1 and the good guy in Pushing Daisies.

Sad part: not free on any streaming service, AFAIK

movieData.overview: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story about 5 mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur as the tale advances.
movieData.tagline: A little blessing in disguise.
movieData.title: The Fall

title: Jurassic Park
comment_text:
*Jurassic Park.*

I'm thirty-two years old, and *every fucking time* I hear that music play and Alan and Ellie see the Brachiosaurs for the first time, I'm immediately transported back to being a five year old. There's no movie that has better captured that feeling of sheer wonderment.

movieData.overview: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.
movieData.tagline: An adventure 65 million years in the making.
movieData.title: Jurassic Park

title: My Cousin Vinny
comment_text: My Cousin Vinny. The more I watch it, the more brilliant it is. It never gets old.

movieData.overview: Two carefree pals traveling through Alabama are mistakenly arrested, and charged with murder. Fortunately, one of them has a cousin who's a lawyer - Vincent Gambini, a former auto mechanic from Brooklyn who just passed his bar exam after his sixth try. When he arrives with his leather-clad girlfriend , to try his first case, it's a real shock - for him and the Deep South!
movieData.tagline: Truth, Justice and the Gambini Way.
movieData.title: My Cousin Vinny

title: Secondhand Lions
comment_text:
Secondhand Lions. Cheesy and heavy-handed at times, but well-cast and heartwarming. A wonderful combination of coming-of-age and classic adventure storytelling, with a healthy dose of whimsy and wholesome life lessons. Plus, Berkeley Breathed (of *Bloom County* & *Opus*) drew the comics that adult Walter has in his studio in the intro/epilogue.

*"Sometimes, the things that may or may not be true, are the things worth believing in the most. That people are basically good; that honor, courage, and virtue mean everything; that power and money, money and power mean nothing; that good always triumphs over evil; and I want you to remember this, that love... true love never dies." -* Robert Duvall as Hub

Edit: Well plant me in the garden, thanks y'all! I've loved reading all your connections with this movie!

movieData.overview: "Secondhand Lions" follows the comedic adventures of an introverted boy left on the doorstep of a pair of reluctant, eccentric great-uncles, whose exotic remembrances stir the boy's spirit and re-ignite the men's lives.
movieData.title: Secondhand Lions

title: Stardust

movieData.overview: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm. His journey takes him into a world beyond his wildest dreams and reveals his true identity.

movieData.overview: The kingdom is in a festive mood as everyone gathers for the royal wedding of Rapunzel and Flynn. title: nightmare before christmas
comment_text:
When I was a child I borrowed nightmare before christmas from the video rental store and I never heard about it before. It was the most magical, gorgeous thing I've seen. I was religiously renting it over and over again and I never talked to friends about it so it seemed like my little obscure discovery 

When I was.a little older, but still a child, and traveling I went into a goth shop and I saw some Jack Skellington artwork. I loudly said what it was to show to the store people that I "get it", like it was some insider reference. I was so proud but no one seemed that impressed although I thought they were my people...

Not long later I realized it was this huge thing, widely popular across the world and definitely not a reflection of my profound tastes and insights. And that every hot shop and other goth stores have the artworks as a given

It very deeply disappointed me but I still think its magical. I just feel it was taken away from me :(

movieData.overview: Tired of scaring humans every October 31 with the same old bag of tricks, Jack Skellington, the spindly king of Halloween Town, kidnaps Santa Claus and plans to deliver shrunken heads and other ghoulish gifts to children on Christmas morning. But as Christmas approaches, Jack's rag-doll girlfriend, Sally, tries to foil his misguided plans.
movieData.tagline: This is Halloween, everybody make a scene!
movieData.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas

title: Stand By Me
comment_text:
Stand By Me.

It's a great film. it's such a wonderful film of childhood and friendships.

It always reminds me of my childhood and the adventures we'd go on. We never found a dead body though.

For the record this has been my favorite film of all time since it came out. I love it so much.

movieData.original_title: STAND BY ME ドラえもん
movieData.overview: In the suburbs of Tokyo some time ago, there lived a clumsy boy about 10 years old. There appeared in front of him named Sewashi, Nobita's descendant of four generations later from the 22nd century, and Doraemon, a 22nd century cat-type caretaker robot who helps people with its secret gadgets. Sewashi claims that his family is suffering from the debts Nobita made even to his generation, so in order to change this disastrous future, he brought along Doraemon as Nobita's caretaker to bring happiness to his future, although Doraemon is not happy about this. And so Sewashi installed an accomplishment program into Doraemon forcing him to take care of Nobita. Unless he makes Nobita happy, Doraemon can no longer go back to the 22nd century. This is how the life of Doraemon and Nobita begins. Will Doraemon succeed this mission and return to the 22nd century?
movieData.tagline: Is Doraemon ending this summer?
movieData.title: Stand by Me Doraemon

movieData.overview: Living with her tyrannical stepfather in a new home with her pregnant mother, 10-year-old Ofelia feels alone until she explores a decaying labyrinth guarded by a mysterious faun who claims to know her destiny. If she wishes to return to her real father, Ofelia must complete three terrifying tasks.
movieData.tagline: What happens when make-believe believes it's real?
movieData.title: Pan's Labyrinth

title: Amelie
comment_text: Amelie

movieData.overview: A girl struggling with asthma is taken to a clinic in South Tyrol to be cured. After some time she decides to get out of this hell (that's how she feels about it) and soon she'll meet a new friend. Together they try to reach the peak of a mountain where, according to an old custom, she can be healed.

title: Edward Scissorhands
comment_text:
Edward Scissorhands 

The plot, the music, the acting, everything about it seems like a real life fairytale

movieData.overview: A small suburban town receives a visit from a castaway unfinished science experiment named Edward.
movieData.tagline: His scars run deep.

title: The princess bride
comment_text: The princess bride

movieData.overview: In this enchantingly cracked fairy tale, the beautiful Princess Buttercup and the dashing Westley must overcome staggering odds to find happiness amid six-fingered swordsmen, murderous princes, Sicilians and rodents of unusual size. But even death can't stop these true lovebirds from triumphing.
movieData.tagline: It's as real as the feelings you feel.

title: Wall-E
comment_text:
Wall-E


Edit: please stop giving this awards, it's not worth it I just said my opinion XD though thank you.

movieData.overview: WALL·E is the last robot left on an Earth that has been overrun with garbage and all humans have fled to outer space. For 700 years he has continued to try and clean up the mess, but has developed some rather interesting human-like qualities. When a ship arrives with a sleek new type of robot, WALL·E thinks he's finally found a friend and stows away on the ship when it leaves.
movieData.tagline: After 700 years of doing what he was built for, he'll discover what he was meant for.
movieData.title: WALL·E

title: The Neverending Story
comment_text: The Neverending Story. Found myself watching that shit on repeat for the longest time. It's really good and holds great memories and a special place in my heart (but we don't talk about the sequel...)

movieData.overview: A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.
movieData.tagline: It's a brand new beginning in the adventure that never ends

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: curse of the Black Pearl
comment_text: Pirates of the Caribbean: curse of the Black Pearl

movieData.original_title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movieData.overview: Jack Sparrow, a freewheeling 18th-century pirate, quarrels with a rival pirate bent on pillaging Port Royal. When the governor's daughter is kidnapped, Sparrow decides to help the girl's love save her.
movieData.tagline: Prepare to be blown out of the water.
movieData.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

title: Jurassic Park
comment_text: Jurassic Park. Amazing graphics and production for it's time. “Bingo! Dino DNA.”

movieData.overview: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.
movieData.tagline: An adventure 65 million years in the making.
movieData.title: Jurassic Park

title: Galaxy Quest
comment_text: Galaxy Quest

movieData.overview: For four years, the courageous crew of the NSEA protector - "Commander Peter Quincy Taggart" (Tim Allen), "Lt. Tawny Madison (Sigourney Weaver) and "Dr.Lazarus" (Alan Rickman) - set off on a thrilling and often dangerous mission in space...and then their series was cancelled! Now, twenty years later, aliens under attack have mistaken the Galaxy Quest television transmissions for "historical documents" and beam up the crew of has-been actors to save the universe. With no script, no director and no clue, the actors must turn in the performances of their lives.
movieData.tagline: A comedy of Galactic Proportions.
movieData.title: Galaxy Quest

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
comment_text:
The Hunchback of Notre Dame. 

I cannot state enough how much it saddens me to see this movie go so unappreciated. The animation is gorgeous even by today's standards. The songs are great. There's not much I can say bad about it. I just kinda wish more people were into it.

belongs_to_collection.name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame Collection

movieData.overview: At the urging of his gargoyle pals, Quasimodo leaves the solitary safety of his Notre Dame tower against the wishes of his guardian, the evil Judge Claude Frollo. He ventures out to the Festival of Fools and finds his first true friend, a Romani woman named Esmeralda, who entrusts him with a secret. When the secret is revealed, Quasi soon finds himself fighting to save the people and city he loves.
movieData.tagline: Join the party!
movieData.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame

title: Spirited away

movieData.overview: The people that brought the film Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi (2001) (a.k.a. "Spirited Away") to the US explain how it was converted into English, with some minor confusion between languages, and how well it did in both Japan and America.
movieData.title: The Art of 'Spirited Away'

title: National Treasure
comment_text: National Treasure

movieData.overview: Modern treasure hunters, led by archaeologist Ben Gates, search for a chest of riches rumored to have been stashed away by George Washington, Thomas Jefferson and Benjamin Franklin during the Revolutionary War. The chest's whereabouts may lie in secret clues embedded in the Constitution and the Declaration of Independence, and Gates is in a race to find the gold before his enemies do.
movieData.tagline: The greatest adventure history has ever revealed.
movieData.title: National Treasure

title: Anastasia
comment_text:
Anastasia (1997)

I was 4 years old when I saw it in theaters for the first time and I still remember the awe I felt at the animation and the music. Still my favorite to this day!

movieData.overview: This animated adventure retells the story of the lost daughter of Russia's last czar. The evil Rasputin places a curse on the Romanov family, and Anastasia and her grandmother, Empress Maria, get separated. After growing up in an orphanage, Anastasia encounters two Russian men seeking a reward offered by Empress Maria for the return of her granddaughter. The trio travels to Paris, where they find that the empress has grown skeptical of imposters.
movieData.tagline: Discover the adventure behind the greatest mystery of our time.
movieData.title: Anastasia

title: Fantasia
comment_text: Fantasia was the first to pop into my mind

movieData.overview: Walt Disney's timeless masterpiece is an extravaganza of sight and sound! See the music come to life, hear the pictures burst into song and experience the excitement that is Fantasia over and over again.
movieData.tagline: The most sensational sound you'll ever see!
movieData.title: Fantasia

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
comment_text: The Grand Budapest Hotel

movieData.overview: The Grand Budapest Hotel tells of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his friendship with a young employee who becomes his trusted protégé. The story involves the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting, the battle for an enormous family fortune and the slow and then sudden upheavals that transformed Europe during the first half of the 20th century.
movieData.tagline: A murder case of Madam D. With enormous wealth and the most outrageous events surrounding her sudden death!
movieData.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel

title: The Martian
comment_text:
The Martian.

The story, the hope, the despair, the music. It *feels* like it could have been based on a real event.

"Teddy. The *Director of NASA.*" "Cool"

And the book is even better.

movieData.overview: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.
movieData.tagline: Bring Him Home
movieData.title: The Martian

title: Lord of the Rings
comment_text: Lord of the Rings

belongs_to_collection.name: The Lord of the Rings Collection

movieData.original_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movieData.overview: Frodo and Sam are trekking to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin. All along, nefarious wizard Saruman awaits the Fellowship members at the Orthanc Tower in Isengard.
movieData.tagline: A New Power Is Rising.
movieData.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

title: Coraline
comment_text: Coraline, you get lost in that film

movieData.overview: When Coraline moves to an old house, she feels bored and neglected by her parents. She finds a hidden door with a bricked up passage. During the night, she crosses the passage and finds a parallel world where everybody has buttons instead of eyes, with caring parents and all her dreams coming true. When the Other Mother invites Coraline to stay in her world forever, the girl refuses and finds that the alternate reality where she is trapped is only a trick to lure her.
movieData.tagline: Be careful what you wish for.
movieData.title: Coraline

title: The Lost Boys
comment_text: The Lost Boys

movieData.overview: A mother and her two teenage sons move to a seemingly nice and quiet small coastal California town yet soon find out that it's overrun by bike gangs and vampires. A couple of teenage friends take it upon themselves to hunt down the vampires that they suspect of a few mysterious murders and restore peace and calm to their town.
movieData.tagline: Sleep all day. Party all night. Never grow old. Never die. It's fun to be a vampire.
movieData.title: The Lost Boys

title: The Goonies
comment_text: The Goonies. Hey you guys!!!

movieData.overview: A young teenager named Mikey Walsh finds an old treasure map in his father's attic. Hoping to save their homes from demolition, Mikey and his friends Data Wang, Chunk Cohen, and Mouth Devereaux run off on a big quest to find the secret stash of Pirate One-Eyed Willie.
movieData.title: The Goonies

title: Tangled
comment_text: Tangled.

movieData.overview: When the kingdom's most wanted-and most charming-bandit Flynn Rider hides out in a mysterious tower, he's taken hostage by Rapunzel, a beautiful and feisty tower-bound teen with 70 feet of magical, golden hair. Flynn's curious captor, who's looking for her ticket out of the tower where she's been locked away for years, strikes a deal with the handsome thief and the unlikely duo sets off on an action-packed escapade, complete with a super-cop horse, an over-protective chameleon and a gruff gang of pub thugs.
movieData.tagline: They're taking adventure to new lengths.
movieData.title: Tangled

title: A Little Princess
comment_text: A Little Princess

movieData.overview: When her father enlists to fight for the British in WWI, young Sara Crewe goes to New York to attend the same boarding school her late mother attended. She soon clashes with the severe headmistress, Miss Minchin, who attempts to stifle Sara's creativity and sense of self- worth.
movieData.tagline: Every girl everywhere is a princess.
movieData.title: A Little Princess

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
comment_text: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

movieData.original_title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
movieData.overview: A timid magazine photo manager who lives life vicariously through daydreams embarks on a true-life adventure when a negative goes missing.
movieData.tagline: Stop Dreaming, Start Living
movieData.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

title: V for Vendetta
comment_text: V for Vendetta.  I used to throw 5th of November parties as a sort of a Halloween Encore.  I've seen it 20+ times and I still laugh, get chills, and tear up every time.

movieData.overview: In a world in which Great Britain has become a fascist state, a masked vigilante known only as “V” conducts guerrilla warfare against the oppressive British government. When V rescues a young woman from the secret police, he finds in her an ally with whom he can continue his fight to free the people of Britain.
movieData.tagline: People should not be afraid of their governments. Governments should be afraid of their people.
movieData.title: V for Vendetta

title: Interstellar
comment_text: Interstellar will forever be one of my favorites. no doubt about it

movieData.overview: The adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.
movieData.tagline: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.
movieData.title: Interstellar

title: Babe
comment_text: Babe

movieData.overview: Babe is a little pig who doesn't quite know his place in the world. With a bunch of odd friends, like Ferdinand the duck who thinks he is a rooster and Fly the dog he calls mum, Babe realises that he has the makings to become the greatest sheep pig of all time, and Farmer Hogget knows it. With the help of the sheep dogs, Babe learns that a pig can be anything that he wants to be.
movieData.tagline: A little pig goes a long way.
movieData.title: Babe

title: Field of Dreams
comment_text:
Field of Dreams.  
  
I'm not a baseball fan, but I watch it every April to celebrate the season starting.  Cry at the end every time.

movieData.overview: Ray Kinsella is an Iowa farmer who hears a mysterious voice telling him to turn his cornfield into a baseball diamond. He does, but the voice's directions don't stop -- even after the spirits of deceased ballplayers turn up to play.
movieData.tagline: If you believe the impossible, the incredible can come true.
movieData.title: Field of Dreams

title: The Matrix
comment_text: The Matrix

movieData.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.
movieData.tagline: Welcome to the Real World.
movieData.title: The Matrix

title: Blade
comment_text:
Blade. Just the first one -- too many people conflate or confuse it with the rest of the trilogy. 

And it stands alone. Even with faux-Gotham it's a perfect snapshot of the late 1990s, from the interior sets to the music to the hip-urban-vampire aesthetic going on then. Snipes' schtick worked around a solid enough plot. Few movies have better continuous-sequence choreography that -- this is key -- gets as outlandishly inventive. It defines beat-'em-up; even better than Burton's Batman. It's impressive and schlocky in all the right places.

movieData.overview: The Daywalker known as "Blade" - a half-vampire, half-mortal man - becomes the protector of humanity against an underground army of vampires.
movieData.tagline: Part Man. Part Vampire. All Hero.
movieData.title: Blade

title: A league of their own
comment_text: A league of their own.... Seen it so many times and it never gets old.

movieData.overview: As America's stock of athletic young men is depleted during World War II, a professional all-female baseball league springs up in the Midwest, funded by publicity-hungry candy maker Walter Harvey (Garry Marshall). Competitive sisters Dottie Hinson (Geena Davis) and Kit Keller (Lori Petty) spar with each other, scout Ernie Capadino (Jon Lovitz) and grumpy has-been coach Jimmy Dugan (Tom Hanks) on their way to fame. Madonna and Rosie O'Donnell co-star as two of the sisters' teammates.
movieData.tagline: To achieve the incredible, you have to attempt the impossible.
movieData.title: A League of Their Own

title: Lion King
comment_text: Lion King 1994

movieData.overview: A young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, who claims he killed his father. While the uncle rules with an iron paw, the prince grows up beyond the Savannah, living by a philosophy: No worries for the rest of your days. But when his past comes to haunt him, the young prince must decide his fate: Will he remain an outcast or face his demons and become what he needs to be?
movieData.tagline: Life's greatest adventure is finding your place in the Circle of Life.
movieData.title: The Lion King

title: Fievel Goes West
comment_text: Fievel Goes West

movieData.original_title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
movieData.overview: Some time after the Mousekewitz's have settled in America, they find that they are still having problems with the threat of cats. That makes them eager to try another home out in the west, where they are promised that mice and cats live in peace. Unfortunately, the one making this claim is an oily con artist named Cat R. Waul who is intent on his own sinister plan.
movieData.tagline: Look out pardners, there's a new mouse in town!
movieData.title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West

title: Ponyo
comment_text: Ponyo. My favorite movie for years even though I only remembered it recently, it's amazing.

title: SHREK
comment_text: SHREK

movieData.overview: It ain't easy bein' green -- especially if you're a likable (albeit smelly) ogre named Shrek. On a mission to retrieve a gorgeous princess from the clutches of a fire-breathing dragon, Shrek teams up with an unlikely compatriot -- a wisecracking donkey.
movieData.tagline: The greatest fairy tale never told.
movieData.title: Shrek

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
comment_text: Ferris Bueller's Day Off, that movie never gets old and I love every second of it.

movieData.overview: After high school slacker Ferris Bueller successfully fakes an illness in order to skip school for the day, he goes on a series of adventures throughout Chicago with his girlfriend Sloane and best friend Cameron, all the while trying to outwit his wily school principal and fed-up sister.
movieData.tagline: One man's struggle to take it easy.
movieData.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off

title: Rear Window
comment_text: Rear Window.  I think it is easily Hitchcock's best movie, and he made some great movies.  Jimmy Stewart is a sexy older man.  Grace Kelly makes you stop breathing when you first see her and she is awesome playing a gorgeous woman who is every bit as smart and adventurous as her boyfriend.  Thelma Ritter is a great character actor. The tension in the movie is almost unbearable and yet it is also full of great, light dialogue.  Every time you watch it something new jumps out at you.

movieData.overview: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
movieData.tagline: It only takes one witness to spoil the perfect crime.
movieData.title: Rear Window

title: Scott Pilgrim vs The World
comment_text:
**Scott Pilgrim vs The World.** It was such a magical thrill ride to watch the first time. Too bad it flopped and never got a sequel.

Edit: spelling

movieData.overview: As bass guitarist for a garage-rock band, Scott Pilgrim has never had trouble getting a girlfriend; usually, the problem is getting rid of them. But when Ramona Flowers skates into his heart, he finds she has the most troublesome baggage of all: an army of ex-boyfriends who will stop at nothing to eliminate him from her list of suitors.
movieData.tagline: Get the hot girl. Defeat her evil exes. Hit love where it hurts.
movieData.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

title: My Neighbor Totoro
comment_text: My Neighbor Totoro.

movieData.overview: Two sisters move to the country with their father in order to be closer to their hospitalized mother, and discover the surrounding trees are inhabited by Totoros, magical spirits of the forest. When the youngest runs away from home, the older sister seeks help from the spirits to find her.
movieData.title: My Neighbor Totoro

title: The Brave Little Toaster
comment_text: The Brave Little Toaster

movieData.overview: A group of dated appliances find themselves stranded in a summer home that their family had just sold decide to, a la The Incredible Journey, seek their young 8 year old "master". Children's film which on the surface is a frivolous fantasy, but with a dark subtext of abandonment, obsolescence, and loneliness.
movieData.tagline: Plug into the adventure!
movieData.title: The Brave Little Toaster

title: The Last Unicorn
comment_text: The Last Unicorn.

movieData.overview: From a riddle-speaking butterfly, a unicorn learns that she is supposedly the last of her kind, all the others having been herded away by the Red Bull. The unicorn sets out to discover the truth behind the butterfly's words. She is eventually joined on her quest by Schmendrick, a second-rate magician, and Molly Grue, a now middle-aged woman who dreamed all her life of seeing a unicorn. Their journey leads them far from home, all the way to the castle of King Haggard.
movieData.tagline: There's Magic in Believing!
movieData.title: The Last Unicorn

title: Dark Crystal
comment_text: Dark Crystal and the new Dark Crystal series. Really bums me out that Netflix cancelled it.

movieData.overview: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal and restore order to his world, before the grotesque race of Skeksis find and use the crystal for evil.
movieData.tagline: Another World, Another Time... In the Age of Wonder.
movieData.title: The Dark Crystal

title: Blazing Saddles
comment_text: Blazing Saddles.   Every time

movieData.overview: A town—where everyone seems to be named Johnson—stands in the way of the railroad. In order to grab their land, robber baron Hedley Lemar sends his henchmen to make life in the town unbearable. After the sheriff is killed, the town demands a new sheriff from the Governor, so Hedley convinces him to send the town the first black sheriff in the west.
movieData.tagline: Never give a saga an even break!
movieData.title: Blazing Saddles

title: A Silent Voice
comment_text:
A Silent Voice.

Everything about it, the story, art, characters and soundtrack is just beautiful to me. Never before have I so strongly identified with a fictional character until watching this movie. The original manga is amazing too, I highly recommend as it includes a nice subplot which fleshes out the secondary characters more. It's also the only movie whose soundtrack I listen to regularly. lit (var) is just beautiful and makes me sob like a baby every time.

movieData.overview: Shouya Ishida starts bullying the new girl in class, Shouko Nishimiya, because she is deaf. But as the teasing continues, the rest of the class starts to turn on Shouya for his lack of compassion. When they leave elementary school, Shouko and Shouya do not speak to each other again... until an older, wiser Shouya, tormented by his past behaviour, decides he must see Shouko once more. He wants to atone for his sins, but is it already too late...?
movieData.tagline: Sometimes the answer is as simple as learning to listen.
movieData.title: A Silent Voice: The Movie

title: Let the Right One In
comment_text: Let the Right One In.  It's hauntingly beautiful.

movieData.overview: Set in 1982 in the suburb of Blackeberg, Stockholm, twelve-year-old Oskar is a lonely outsider, bullied at school by his classmates; at home, Oskar dreams of revenge against a trio of bullies. He befriends his twelve-year-old, next-door neighbor Eli, who only appears at night in the snow-covered playground outside their building.
movieData.tagline: Eli is 12 years old. She’s been 12 for over 200 years and she just moved in next door.
movieData.title: Let the Right One In

title: Almost Famous
comment_text: I don't know if you have to be a fan of 70s rock to find **Almost Famous** magical, but damn it's a magical movie.

movieData.overview: In 1973, 15-year-old William Miller's unabashed love of music and aspiration to become a rock journalist lands him an assignment from Rolling Stone magazine to interview and tour with the up-and-coming band Stillwater.
movieData.tagline: Experience it. Enjoy it. Just don't fall for it.
movieData.title: Almost Famous

title: Mary Poppins
comment_text: Mary Poppins

title: Blues Brothers
comment_text: Blues Brothers.

movieData.overview: Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts his old band back togther to save the Catholic home where he and his brother Elwood were raised.
movieData.tagline: They're on a mission from God.
movieData.title: The Blues Brothers

title: Catch Me If You Can
comment_text: “Catch Me If You Can”.  I was asked one time what my all-time favorite movie is.  I didn't even know, but then my sister chimed in and said she knew what it was.  I laughed and she said catch me if you can and, god dammit, she was totally right.

movieData.overview: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor. An FBI agent makes it his mission to put him behind bars. But Frank not only eludes capture, he revels in the pursuit.
movieData.tagline: The true story of a real fake.
movieData.title: Catch Me If You Can

title: Superbad
comment_text:
Superbad.

They just nailed it in so many scenes, so many conversations.

movieData.tagline: Come and Get Some!
movieData.title: Superbad

title: The Goonies
comment_text: The Goonies. Nothing else really ever gave me the same sense of childhood adventure.

movieData.overview: A young teenager named Mikey Walsh finds an old treasure map in his father's attic. Hoping to save their homes from demolition, Mikey and his friends Data Wang, Chunk Cohen, and Mouth Devereaux run off on a big quest to find the secret stash of Pirate One-Eyed Willie.
movieData.title: The Goonies

title: Star Wars The Empire Strikes Back
comment_text: Star Wars The Empire Strikes Back.  The rebel base in the snow caves, the battle of Hoth, Yoda's house, on the run in the Millennium Falcon, Cloud City.

movieData.overview: The epic saga continues as Luke Skywalker, in hopes of defeating the evil Galactic Empire, learns the ways of the Jedi from aging master Yoda. Meanwhile, rebel leader Princess Leia, cocky Han Solo, Chewbacca, and droids C-3PO and R2-D2 are thrown into various stages of capture, betrayal and despair.
movieData.tagline: The Adventure Continues...

title: Pleasantville

movieData.tagline: Nothing is as simple as black and white.
movieData.title: Pleasantville

title: Forrest Gump
comment_text: Forrest Gump

movieData.overview: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.
movieData.tagline: Life is like a box of chocolates...you never know what you're gonna get.

movieData.tagline: When Earth Ends, The Adventure Begins.

title: Into the SpiderVerse
comment_text:
Into the SpiderVerse. 

i love that movie and could watch it 100 times and never get tired of it

movieData.overview: Miles Morales is juggling his life between being a high school student and being a spider-man. When Wilson "Kingpin" Fisk uses a super collider, others from across the Spider-Verse are transported to this dimension.

title: The Fountain
comment_text: The Fountain.

Children of men 

Last of the Mohicans 

Mars Attacks

Last of the Mohicans

movieData.tagline: Nice planet. We'll take it!
movieData.title: Mars Attacks!

title: Cirque du Soleil: Worlds Away
comment_text:
1)Cirque du Soleil: Worlds Away. 
Still very obscure as far as I know, but I love it! It's gorgeous and fantastical. It's my go-to movie when I'm having a creative slump or need help getting to sleep. 

2)Literally anything from Studio Ghibli. 
Ghibli is my go-to when I'm having a rough day.

movieData.overview: An original story featuring performances by Cirque du Soleil. A young woman is entranced by an Aerialist. When they fall into the dreamlike world of Cirque du Soleil and are separated, they travel through the different tent worlds trying to find each other.
movieData.tagline: Experience a Journey Like Never Before
movieData.title: Cirque du Soleil: Worlds Away

title: Little Rascals
comment_text: I LOVE The Little Rascals 1994! There's no logical reason why I love it so much but I do.

movieData.overview: When Alfalfa starts to question his devotion to the club's principles after falling for the beautiful nine-year old Darla, the rest of the gang sets out to keep them apart.
movieData.tagline: Mischief loves company.
movieData.title: The Little Rascals

title: Moulin Rouge
comment_text: Moulin Rouge

movieData.overview: A celebration of love and creative inspiration takes place in the infamous, gaudy and glamorous Parisian nightclub, at the cusp of the 20th century. A young poet, who is plunged into the heady world of Moulin Rouge, begins a passionate affair with the club's most notorious and beautiful star.
movieData.tagline: No Laws. No Limits. One Rule. Never Fall In Love.
movieData.title: Moulin Rouge!

title: The Fifth Element
comment_text:
The Fifth Element.

Watched it at the theater when I was younger and fell in love with it. Still my favorite movie and have watched it hundreds of times. It it a masterpiece of filmmaking? Not at all, but I love it.

movieData.overview: In 2257, a taxi driver is unintentionally given the task of saving a young girl who is part of the key that will ensure the survival of humanity.
movieData.tagline: There is no future without it.
movieData.title: The Fifth Element

title: Excellent Adventure
comment_text:
Not a single movie, but a trilogy...

Anyway, the Bill & Ted movies, Excellent Adventure (1989), Bogus Journey (1991) and Face the Music (2020). 
Keanu Reeves and Alex Winter as two high school slackers who must travel through time and face Death and other obstackles to become the saviours of mankind. 

It reminds me of my teenage years, of simpler times, and the fact that if two slackers can save mankind, so can I, lol.

movieData.overview: Bill and Ted are high school buddies starting a band. They are also about to fail their history class—which means Ted would be sent to military school—but receive help from Rufus, a traveller from a future where their band is the foundation for a perfect society. With the use of Rufus' time machine, Bill and Ted travel to various points in history, returning with important figures to help them complete their final history presentation.
movieData.tagline: History is about to be rewritten by two guys who can't spell.
movieData.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure

title: Bogus Journey
comment_text:
Not a single movie, but a trilogy...

Anyway, the Bill & Ted movies, Excellent Adventure (1989), Bogus Journey (1991) and Face the Music (2020). 
Keanu Reeves and Alex Winter as two high school slackers who must travel through time and face Death and other obstackles to become the saviours of mankind. 

It reminds me of my teenage years, of simpler times, and the fact that if two slackers can save mankind, so can I, lol.

movieData.overview: Amiable slackers Bill and Ted are once again roped into a fantastical adventure when De Nomolos, a villain from the future, sends evil robot duplicates of the two lads to terminate and replace them. The robot doubles actually succeed in killing Bill and Ted, but the two are determined to escape the afterlife, challenging the Grim Reaper to a series of games in order to return to the land of the living.
movieData.tagline: Once... they made history. Now... they are history.
movieData.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey

title: Face the Music
comment_text:
Not a single movie, but a trilogy...

Anyway, the Bill & Ted movies, Excellent Adventure (1989), Bogus Journey (1991) and Face the Music (2020). 
Keanu Reeves and Alex Winter as two high school slackers who must travel through time and face Death and other obstackles to become the saviours of mankind. 

It reminds me of my teenage years, of simpler times, and the fact that if two slackers can save mankind, so can I, lol.

movieData.overview: Yet to fulfill their rock and roll destiny, the now middle-aged best friends Bill and Ted set out on a new adventure when a visitor from the future warns them that only their song can save life as we know it. Along the way, they are helped by their daughters, a new batch of historical figures and a few music legends—to seek the song that will set their world right and bring harmony to the universe.
movieData.tagline: The future awaits
movieData.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music

title: Stardust
comment_text: Stardust

movieData.overview: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm. His journey takes him into a world beyond his wildest dreams and reveals his true identity.
movieData.tagline: This Summer A Star Falls. The Chase Begins.
movieData.title: Stardust

title: Legend
comment_text: Legend (1985) starring Tom Cruise, Tim Curry, and Mia Sara, directed by Ridley Scott. Like many of Ridley Scott's films, it's just overflowing with atmosphere and ambiance. The sets are so ridiculous and well done and it's a fun little fantasy adventure. I re-watch it at least a couple times a year.

movieData.overview: Suave, charming and volatile, Reggie Kray and his unstable twin brother Ronnie start to leave their mark on the London underworld in the 1960s. Using violence to get what they want, the siblings orchestrate robberies and murders while running nightclubs and protection rackets. With police Detective Leonard "Nipper" Read hot on their heels, the brothers continue their rapid rise to power and achieve tabloid notoriety.
movieData.tagline: Love, fight, live, rule like a legend.
movieData.title: Legend

title: HOCUS POCUS
comment_text: HOCUS POCUS , I DON'T CARE IF THAT MOVIE IS FROM THE EARLY '90S.  THAT MOVIE WILL ALWAYS BRING BACK THE BEST CHILDHOOD MEMORIES. ❤️❤️❤️

movieData.overview: After 300 years of slumber, three sister witches are accidentally resurrected in Salem on Halloween night, and it is up to three kids and their newfound feline friend to put an end to the witches' reign of terror once and for all.
movieData.tagline: It's just a bunch of Hocus Pocus.
movieData.title: Hocus Pocus

title: The Bird Cage
comment_text: The Bird Cage

movieData.overview: Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.
movieData.tagline: Women so hot with desire they melt the chains that enslave them!
movieData.title: The Big Bird Cage

title: A Beautiful Mind
comment_text: A Beautiful Mind

movieData.overview: John Nash is a brilliant but asocial mathematician fighting schizophrenia. After he accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
movieData.tagline: He saw the world in a way no one could have imagined.
movieData.title: A Beautiful Mind

title: Brother Bear
comment_text: Brother Bear

movieData.overview: When an impulsive boy named Kenai is magically transformed into a bear, he must literally walk in another's footsteps until he learns some valuable life lessons. His courageous and often zany journey introduces him to a forest full of wildlife, including the lovable bear cub Koda, hilarious moose Rutt and Tuke, woolly mammoths and rambunctious rams.
movieData.tagline: Nature Calls
movieData.title: Brother Bear

title: Snatch
comment_text: Snatch

movieData.overview: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
movieData.tagline: Stealin' stones and breakin' bones.
movieData.title: Snatch

title: Dark Crystal
comment_text: No one has yet mentioned The Dark Crystal. Jim Henson's artistry transcends the decades, and though it's a classic quest story, Good doesn't need to destroy evil in the end for things to work out. Nuanced, beautiful and icky in equal measure. Transfixing.

movieData.overview: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal and restore order to his world, before the grotesque race of Skeksis find and use the crystal for evil.
movieData.tagline: Another World, Another Time... In the Age of Wonder.
movieData.title: The Dark Crystal

title: Across the Universe
comment_text:
Across the Universe (2007) :) 

Your appreciation of the film depends entirely on if you think the singing is corny or fun

movieData.overview: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in the United States, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, who joins the growing anti-war movement. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
movieData.tagline: All you need is love.
movieData.title: Across the Universe

title: Moana
comment_text: Moana

movieData.overview: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain's daughter's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the demigod to set things right.
movieData.tagline: The ocean is calling.
movieData.title: Moana

title: A fish called Wanda
comment_text: A fish called Wanda

movieData.overview: A diamond advocate is attempting to steal a collection of diamonds, yet troubles arise when he realizes that he is not the only one after the diamonds.
movieData.tagline: A tale of murder, lust, greed, revenge, and seafood.
movieData.title: A Fish Called Wanda

title: The craft
comment_text: The craft!

movieData.overview: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.
movieData.tagline: Let the ritual begin
movieData.title: The Craft: Legacy

title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
comment_text: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers. Classic movie

movieData.overview: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.
movieData.tagline: SINGIN'! DANCIN'! ROMANCIN'!
movieData.title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers

title: Princess Mononoke
comment_text: Princess Mononoke

movieData.overview: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Emishi people, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.
movieData.tagline: The Fate Of The World Rests On The Courage Of One Warrior.
movieData.title: Princess Mononoke

title: Labyrinth
comment_text: Labyrinth

movieData.overview: When teen Sarah is forced to babysit Toby, her baby stepbrother, she summons Jareth the Goblin King to take him away. When he is actually kidnapped, Sarah is given just thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue him.
movieData.tagline: Where everything seems possible and nothing is what it seems.
movieData.title: Labyrinth

title: Harold and Maude
comment_text: Harold and Maude

movieData.overview: The young Harold lives in his own world of suicide-attempts and funeral visits to avoid the misery of his current family and home environment. Harold meets an 80-year-old woman named Maude who also lives in her own world yet one in which she is having the time of her life. When the two opposites meet they realize that their differences don’t matter and they become best friends and love each other.
movieData.tagline: They were meant to be. But exactly what they were meant to be is not quite clear.
movieData.title: Harold and Maude

title: Return to Oz
comment_text:
Return to Oz.

Disney always treated that film like a horrendous embarrassment, but it was so important to my childhood and a great little experiment in bringing Baum's work back to its more twisted roots (after the original film sugar-coated it in the minds of the public).

movieData.overview: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, finds herself back in the land of her dreams, and makes delightful new friends, and dangerous new enemies.
movieData.tagline: An all-new adventure down the yellow brick road.
movieData.title: Return to Oz

title: The Mummy
comment_text: The Mummy, with Brendan Frasier. Watched it growing up as a kid and all the sequels. They progressively got worse, but the first one still holds a place in my heart.

movieData.overview: A group of archaeology students awaken an ancient mummy. After being trapped in a time loop, the only way they can escape, is to defeat the mummy. As the body count rises, it seems the Mummy has to collect the souls of those who woke him to be able to walk the earth - for good.
movieData.tagline: Evil has been unearthed.
movieData.title: Rise of the Mummy

title: Stargate
comment_text: Stargate!

movieData.overview: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.
movieData.tagline: It will take you a million light years from home. But will it bring you back?
movieData.title: Stargate

title: The Land Before Time
comment_text: The Land Before Time. Only the first one though! I was obsessed with this movie as a kid, since I loved dinosaurs. That scene with Little Foot and his mum gets me every time :,(

movieData.overview: An orphaned brontosaurus named Littlefoot sets off in search of the legendary Great Valley. A land of lush vegetation where the dinosaurs can thrive and live in peace. Along the way he meets four other young dinosaurs, each one a different species, and they encounter several obstacles as they learn to work together in order to survive.
movieData.tagline: A new adventure is born.
movieData.title: The Land Before Time

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
comment_text: Monty Python and the Holy Grail. The ending seals it for me especially after learning it happened only because they had no money.

movieData.original_title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movieData.overview: King Arthur, accompanied by his squire, recruits his Knights of the Round Table, including Sir Bedevere the Wise, Sir Lancelot the Brave, Sir Robin the Not-Quite-So-Brave-As-Sir-Lancelot and Sir Galahad the Pure. On the way, Arthur battles the Black Knight who, despite having had all his limbs chopped off, insists he can still fight. They reach Camelot, but Arthur decides not  to enter, as "it is a silly place".
movieData.tagline: And now! At Last! Another film completely different from some of the other films which aren't quite the same as this one is.
movieData.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail

title: Lion king
comment_text:
Lion king OG
And Mulan

movieData.overview: A young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, who claims he killed his father. While the uncle rules with an iron paw, the prince grows up beyond the Savannah, living by a philosophy: No worries for the rest of your days. But when his past comes to haunt him, the young prince must decide his fate: Will he remain an outcast or face his demons and become what he needs to be?
movieData.tagline: Life's greatest adventure is finding your place in the Circle of Life.
movieData.title: The Lion King

title: Mulan
comment_text:
Lion king OG
And Mulan

movieData.overview: When the Emperor of China issues a decree that one man per family must serve in the Imperial Chinese Army to defend the country from Huns, Hua Mulan, the eldest daughter of an honored warrior, steps in to take the place of her ailing father. She is spirited, determined and quick on her feet. Disguised as a man by the name of Hua Jun, she is tested every step of the way and must harness her innermost strength and embrace her true potential.
movieData.title: Mulan

title: Real Genius
comment_text: Real Genius

movieData.overview: Chris is the top brain who just wants to party, Mitch is the 15-year-old college wiz kid. Supposedly hard at work on a lab project with a mysterious deadline, they still find time to use their genius to discover new ways to have fun.
movieData.tagline: Who ELSE can turn lasers into light shows, aircraft into armchairs, and high-tech into hijinks?
movieData.title: Real Genius

title: 50 First Dates
comment_text: 50 First Dates. Silly, stupid like most of Sandler's movies but it somehow struck my funny bone.

movieData.overview: Henry is a player skilled at seducing women. But when this veterinarian meets Lucy, a girl with a quirky problem when it comes to total recall, he realizes it's possible to fall in love all over again…and again, and again. That's because the delightful Lucy has no short-term memory, so Henry must woo her day after day until he finally sweeps her off her feet.
movieData.tagline: Imagine having to win over the girl of your dreams... every friggin' day.
movieData.title: 50 First Dates

title: Ocean's 11
comment_text:
There is no incorrect answer here I love it.

Ocean's 11

movieData.overview: Vintage newsreels and interviews help re-create the magic of "The Summit," a memorable period in 1960 in which Frank Sinatra and his Rat Pack took over Las Vegas' Sands Hotel during filming of the original Ocean's 11. Highlights include clips from the Rat Pack's nightly performances in the hotel's legendary Copa Room, where they entertained everyone from mafiosos to soon-to-be-president John F. Kennedy.
movieData.title: The Ocean's 11 Story

title: The Waterboy
comment_text:
The Waterboy.

I know its shite but me & my dad used to watch it all the time when I was young.

Hopefully my wee boy watches it with me when he's a bit older.

movieData.overview: Bobby Boucher is a water boy for a struggling college football team. The coach discovers Boucher's hidden rage makes him a tackling machine whose bone-crushing power might vault his team into the playoffs.
movieData.tagline: You can mess with him. But don't mess with his water.
movieData.title: The Waterboy

title: donnie darko
comment_text: donnie darko

movieData.overview: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.
movieData.tagline: You can never go too far.
movieData.title: Donnie Darko

title: Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind
comment_text:
Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind. 

I was 16 when I watched it, which was 2 years after its release. I became obsessed with it. After that movie I understood I could decide what movies to watch based on who directed it and/or who wrote it.

movieData.original_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movieData.overview: Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realises that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.
movieData.tagline: You can erase someone from your mind. Getting them out of your heart is another story.
movieData.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

comment_text: To me it's 9 (the animated movie directed by Tim Burton). It's not very well known or liked but I find it extremely emotional and inspiring.

movieData.overview: When 9 first comes to life, he finds himself in a post-apocalyptic world. All humans are gone, and it is only by chance that he discovers a small community of others like him taking refuge from fearsome machines that roam the earth intent on their extinction. Despite being the neophyte of the group, 9 convinces the others that hiding will do them no good.
movieData.tagline: When our world ended their mission began.

title: Boogie Nights
comment_text: Boogie Nights. It's just so damn good. I never get tired of it.

movieData.overview: Set in 1977, back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, idealistic porn producer Jack Horner aspires to elevate his craft to an art form. Horner discovers Eddie Adams, a hot young talent working as a busboy in a nightclub, and welcomes him into the extended family of movie-makers, misfits and hangers-on that are always around. Adams' rise from nobody to a celebrity adult entertainer is meteoric, and soon the whole world seems to know his porn alter ego, "Dirk Diggler". Now, when disco and drugs are in vogue, fashion is in flux and the party never seems to stop, Adams' dreams of turning sex into stardom are about to collide with cold, hard reality.
movieData.tagline: The life of a dreamer, the days of a business, and the nights in between.
movieData.title: Boogie Nights

title: Wreck It Ralph
comment_text: Wreck It Ralph. Every time I watch it I feel the same way I did the first time I saw it, it just never gets old to me.

movieData.overview: Wreck-It Ralph is the 9-foot-tall, 643-pound villain of an arcade video game named Fix-It Felix Jr., in which the game's titular hero fixes buildings that Ralph destroys. Wanting to prove he can be a good guy and not just a villain, Ralph escapes his game and lands in Hero's Duty, a first-person shooter where he helps the game's hero battle against alien invaders. He later enters Sugar Rush, a kart racing game set on tracks made of candies, cookies and other sweets. There, Ralph meets Vanellope von Schweetz who has learned that her game is faced with a dire threat that could affect the entire arcade, and one that Ralph may have inadvertently started.
movieData.tagline: The story of a regular guy just looking for a little wreck-ognition.
movieData.title: Wreck-It Ralph

title: Smokey and the Bandit
comment_text:
Smokey and the Bandit   
ONLY the first one and ONLY the movie, not the TV series

movieData.overview: A race car driver tries to transport an illegal beer shipment from Texas to Atlanta in under 28 hours, picking up a reluctant bride-to-be on the way.
movieData.tagline: What we have here is a total lack of respect for the law!
movieData.title: Smokey and the Bandit

title: How to train your dragon
comment_text: How to train your dragon

belongs_to_collection.name: How to Train Your Dragon Collection

movieData.overview: As the son of a Viking leader on the cusp of manhood, shy Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III faces a rite of passage: he must kill a dragon to prove his warrior mettle. But after downing a feared dragon, he realizes that he no longer wants to destroy it, and instead befriends the beast – which he names Toothless – much to the chagrin of his warrior father
movieData.tagline: One adventure will change two worlds
movieData.title: How to Train Your Dragon

title: Mystery Men
comment_text: Mystery Men. If you know you know.

movieData.overview: When Champion City's hero Captain Amazing is kidnapped by the recently paroled supervillain Casanova Frankenstein, a trio of average, everyday superheroes -- Mr. Furious, the Shoveler and the Blue Raja -- assemble a new super team to save him.
movieData.tagline: We're not your classic heroes, we're the other guys.
movieData.title: Mystery Men

title: How to train your dragon
comment_text: How to train your dragon 1. That music..... It gives me the shivers every time.

belongs_to_collection.name: How to Train Your Dragon Collection

But after downing a feared dragon, he realizes that he no longer wants to destroy it, and instead befriends the beast – which he names Toothless – much to the chagrin of his warrior father
movieData.tagline: One adventure will change two worlds

title: Independence Day
comment_text:
Independence Day.  Been my favorite movie for over 2 decades and I still watch it if I catch it on TV.  

Ive also read the handful of tie in books as well.  really fills in a lot of plot holes.

movieData.overview: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped 'destroyer' spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet. On July 3, the United States conducts a coordinated counterattack that fails. On July 4, a plan is devised to gain access to the interior of the alien mothership in space, in order to plant a nuclear missile.
movieData.tagline: Don't make plans for August.
movieData.title: Independence Day

title: Drop Dead Fred
comment_text:
Drop Dead Fred.

Truly a masterpiece. I love Rik Mayall. I love Phoebe Cates. I love Carrie Fisher. Just wonderful in every way.

movieData.overview: When Elizabeth returns to her mother's home after her marriage breaks up, she recreates her imaginary childhood friend, Fred, to escape from the trauma of losing her husband and her job. In between the chaos and mayhem that Fred creates, Elizabeth attempts to win back her husband and return to normality.
movieData.tagline: Dishes. Relationships. Wind. This guy breaks everything.
movieData.title: Drop Dead Fred

title: Atlantis
comment_text: Disney's Atlantis.The sequel was crap though.

movieData.overview: Milo and Kida reunite with their friends to investigate strange occurances around the world that seem to have links to the secrets of Atlantis.
movieData.tagline: The all-new adventures
movieData.title: Atlantis: Milo's Return

title: Jumanji
comment_text: Jumanji (1995)

movieData.overview: As the gang return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they discover that nothing is as they expect. The players will have to brave parts unknown and unexplored in order to escape the world’s most dangerous game.
movieData.title: Jumanji: The Next Level

title: The Usual Suspects
comment_text: I would say The Usual Suspects. Not in the typical way but in the writing aspect of it. The actors did a great job portraying the characters and the whole plot line was pretty good. Especially for a movie in its time it was outstanding.

movieData.overview: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist that ended with an explosion in San Pedro harbor – leaving few survivors. Verbal lures his interrogators with an incredible story of the crime lord's almost supernatural prowess.
movieData.tagline: Five Criminals. One Line Up. No Coincidence.
movieData.title: The Usual Suspects

title: The Big Lebowski
comment_text: The Big Lebowski

movieData.overview: Jeffrey 'The Dude' Lebowski, a Los Angeles slacker who only wants to bowl and drink White Russians, is mistaken for another Jeffrey Lebowski, a wheelchair-bound millionaire, and finds himself dragged into a strange series of events involving nihilists, adult film producers, ferrets, errant toes, and large sums of money.
movieData.tagline: Times like these call for a Big Lebowski.
movieData.title: The Big Lebowski

title: Now and Then
comment_text:
Now and Then. 

One of my favorites growing up!

movieData.overview: Waxing nostalgic about the bittersweet passage from childhood to puberty in this tender coming-of-age tale, four childhood girlfriends -- Teeny, Chrissy, Samantha and Roberta -- recall the magical summer of 1970. During their walk down memory lane, they reconcile experiences with boys, secrets, bullies and more.
movieData.tagline: In every woman there is the girl she left behind.
movieData.title: Now and Then

title: Singin in the rain
comment_text: Singin in the rain

movieData.overview: In 1927 Hollywood, a silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
movieData.tagline: What a Glorious Feeling!
movieData.title: Singin' in the Rain

title: Big Fish
comment_text: Big Fish (2003), I'd call it "whimsical"

movieData.overview: Throughout his life Edward Bloom has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales. In his later years, he remains a huge mystery to his son, William. Now, to get to know the real man, Will begins piecing together a true picture of his father from flashbacks of his amazing adventures.
movieData.tagline: An adventure as big as life itself.
movieData.title: Big Fish

title: Hot Fuzz
comment_text:
Hot Fuzz. 

Hardly any line is wasted in the film. Everything is either a set up to or a punchline of some multi-scene joke.  It's just { *chef's kiss* }!

movieData.overview: As a former London constable, Nicholas Angel finds it difficult to adapt to his new assignment in the sleepy British village of Sandford. Not only does he miss the excitement of the big city, but he also has a well-meaning oaf for a partner. However, when a series of grisly accidents rocks Sandford, Angel smells something rotten in the idyllic village.
movieData.tagline: Big cops. Small town. Moderate violence.
movieData.title: Hot Fuzz

title: Spirited away
comment_text: Spirited away

movieData.overview: The people that brought the film Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi (2001) (a.k.a. "Spirited Away") to the US explain how it was converted into English, with some minor confusion between languages, and how well it did in both Japan and America.
movieData.title: The Art of 'Spirited Away'

title: Charlotte's Web
comment_text: Charlotte's Web, the animated version.

movieData.overview: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.
movieData.tagline: Something unexpected, unbelievable, unforgettable.
movieData.title: Charlotte's Web

title: Clue
comment_text:
Clue. I've seen it a hundred times but even now when I re-watch it I always spot something new. Like a joke I didn't get before, or a reference I never noticed.

You better get that damned remake right, Ryan Reynolds.

movieData.overview: Clue finds six colorful dinner guests gathered at the mansion of their host, Mr. Boddy -- who turns up dead after his secret is exposed: He was blackmailing all of them. With the killer among them, the guests and Boddy's chatty butler must suss out the culprit before the body count rises.
movieData.tagline: Seven Suspects, Six Weapons, Five Bodies and Three Endings.
movieData.title: Clue

title: The Chronicles of Narnia
comment_text: The Chronicles of Narnia

movieData.original_title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
movieData.overview: One year after their incredible adventures in the Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, Peter, Edmund, Lucy and Susan Pevensie return to Narnia to aid a young prince whose life has been threatened by the evil King Miraz. Now, with the help of a colorful cast of new characters, including Trufflehunter the badger and Nikabrik the dwarf, the Pevensie clan embarks on an incredible quest to ensure that Narnia is returned to its rightful heir.
movieData.tagline: Everything you know is about to change forever.
movieData.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian

title: Shawshank Redemption
comment_text: Shawshank Redemption

movieData.overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
movieData.tagline: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
movieData.title: The Shawshank Redemption

title: Joe Versus The Volcano
comment_text: Joe Vs. The Volcano

movieData.overview: Hypochondriac Joe Banks finds out he has six months to live, quits his dead end job, musters the courage to ask his co-worker out on a date, and is then hired to jump into a volcano by a mysterious visitor.
movieData.tagline: An average Joe. An adventurous comedy.

title: Dead Poets Society
comment_text: Dead Poets Society

movieData.overview: At an elite, old-fashioned boarding school in New England, a passionate English teacher inspires his students to rebel against convention and seize the potential of every day, courting the disdain of the stern headmaster.
movieData.tagline: He was their inspiration. He made their lives extraordinary.
movieData.title: Dead Poets Society

title: watership down
comment_text: watership down. less magical and more absolutley terrifying, but it's still very charming
