title: The Little Mermaid
comment_text: The Little Mermaid.

movieData.overview: This colorful adventure tells the story of an impetuous mermaid princess named Ariel who falls in love with the very human Prince Eric and puts everything on the line for the chance to be with him. Memorable songs and characters -- including the villainous sea witch Ursula.
movieData.tagline: Somewhere under the sea and beyond your imagination is an adventure in fantasy.
movieData.title: The Little Mermaid

title: Dazed and Confused
comment_text:
Dazed and Confused

“Behind every good man is a Martha Washington, man.”

movieData.overview: The adventures of a group of Texas teens on their last day of school in 1976, centering on student Randall Floyd, who moves easily among stoners, jocks and geeks. Floyd is a star athlete, but he also likes smoking weed, which presents a conundrum when his football coach demands he sign a "no drugs" pledge.
movieData.tagline: See it with a bud.
movieData.title: Dazed and Confused

title: The Sandlot
comment_text:
The Sandlot
"You're killing me smalls"

movieData.overview: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.
movieData.tagline: A piece of paradise a half block wide and a whole summer long.
movieData.title: The Sandlot

title: A Knight's Tale
comment_text: A Knight's Tale, I don't know why but I love that movie, Heath ledger always put a smile on my face as Sir Ulrich Von Liechtenstein.

movieData.overview: William Thather, a knight's peasant apprentice, gets a chance at glory when the knight dies suddenly mid-tournament. Posing as a knight himself, William won't stop until he's crowned tournament champion—assuming matters of the heart don't get in the way.
movieData.tagline: He Will Rock You
movieData.title: A Knight's Tale

title: House of Flying Daggers
comment_text: House of Flying Daggers. What an incredibly gorgeous movie. When I first saw it, I came into it in the middle, had no idea what I was watching  but I couldn't stop because it was just beautiful. Went back and watched the entire movie. I love it.

movieData.original_title: Making of House of Flying Daggers
movieData.overview: Main Characters/Performers: 1. Xiao Mei - first appearing as new star dancer in lavish Peony Pavilion brothel, Mei is believed to be the blind daughter of a rebel group's recently assassinated leader- played by Zhang Ziyi . 2. Jin - police captain in the ruling Tang emperor's service, enlisted by his superior Leo to play the role of double agent by helping Mei escape and getting her to lead him - and government troops - to the rebel stronghold - played by Takeshi Kaneshiro. 3. Leo - introduced as a high ranking policeman in the Tang emperor's service, Leo turns out to a mole planted years earlier by the rebels working to overthrow the corrupt ruling Tang government - played by Andy Lau.
movieData.title: Making of House of Flying Daggers

title: E.T.
comment_text: E.T. and Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind.

movieData.overview: After a gentle alien becomes stranded on Earth, the being is discovered and befriended by a young boy named Elliott. Bringing the extraterrestrial into his suburban California house, Elliott introduces E.T., as the alien is dubbed, to his brother and his little sister, Gertie, and the children decide to keep its existence a secret. Soon, however, E.T. falls ill, resulting in government intervention and a dire situation for both Elliott and the alien.
movieData.tagline: He is afraid. He is alone. He is three million light years from home.
movieData.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

title: Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind
comment_text: E.T. and Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind.

movieData.original_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movieData.overview: Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realises that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.
movieData.tagline: You can erase someone from your mind. Getting them out of your heart is another story.
movieData.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

title: James and the Giant Peach
comment_text: James and the Giant Peach

movieData.overview: When the young orphan boy James spills a magic bag of crocodile tongues, he finds himself in possession of a giant peach that flies him away to strange lands.
movieData.tagline: Adventures this big don't grow on trees.
movieData.title: James and the Giant Peach

title: Mrs Doubtfire
comment_text:
Mrs Doubtfire. 

I feel like I hear a new Robin Williams witty one-liner I never caught before every time.

movieData.overview: Loving but irresponsible dad Daniel Hillard, estranged from his exasperated spouse, is crushed by a court order allowing only weekly visits with his kids. When Daniel learns his ex needs a housekeeper, he gets the job -- disguised as an English nanny. Soon he becomes not only his children's best pal but the kind of parent he should have been from the start.
movieData.tagline: She makes dinner. She does windows. She reads bedtime stories. She's a blessing... in disguise.
movieData.title: Mrs. Doubtfire

title: Waking Life
comment_text: Waking Life

movieData.overview: Waking Life is about a young man in a persistent lucid dream-like state. The film follows its protagonist as he initially observes and later participates in philosophical discussions that weave together issues like reality, free will, our relationships with others, and the meaning of life.
movieData.tagline: Dreams. What are they? An escape from reality or reality itself?
movieData.title: Waking Life

title: John Wick
comment_text: John Wick.

movieData.overview: Super-assassin John Wick returns with a $14 million price tag on his head and an army of bounty-hunting killers on his trail. After killing a member of the shadowy international assassin’s guild, the High Table, John Wick is excommunicado, but the world’s most ruthless hit men and women await his every turn.
movieData.tagline: The Grace Period Is Over
movieData.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum

title: Lord of the Rings
comment_text: Insanely popular, but the Lord of the Rings. Its a cinematic and scenic masterpiece of a movie. And its even more mindblowing that it was all made in the early 2000s. Just look at all those scenes. Its all filmed in New Zealand too. Its really quite wonderful, and a great movie series. Go watch The Hobbit NOW if you haven't before. Its amazing.

belongs_to_collection.name: The Lord of the Rings Collection

movieData.original_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movieData.overview: Frodo and Sam are trekking to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin. All along, nefarious wizard Saruman awaits the Fellowship members at the Orthanc Tower in Isengard.
movieData.tagline: A New Power Is Rising.
movieData.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

title: The perks of being a wallflower
comment_text: The perks of being a wallflower

movieData.original_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
movieData.overview: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, 1991. High school freshman Charlie is a wallflower, always watching life from the sidelines, until two senior students, Sam and her stepbrother Patrick, become his mentors, helping him discover the joys of friendship, music and love.
movieData.tagline: We are infinite.
movieData.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

title: Indiana Jones
comment_text: Indiana Jones, I fucking love it

movieData.original_title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movieData.overview: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana must team up with Marcus Brody, Sallah and Elsa Schneider to follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis from recovering the power of eternal life.
movieData.tagline: The man with the hat is back. And this time, he's bringing his Dad.
movieData.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

title: FernGully
comment_text:
Fern Gully*, that and Independance Day are my two big movies from when I was a kid. FG is magical and ID is badass. 

^^*Full ^^title; ^^FernGully: ^^The ^^Last ^^Rainforest ^^((1992)^)

movieData.overview: When a sprite named Crysta shrinks a human boy, Zak, down to her size, he vows to help the magical fairy folk stop a greedy logging company from destroying their home: the pristine rainforest known as FernGully. Zak and his new friends fight to defend FernGully from lumberjacks — and the vengeful spirit they accidentally unleash after chopping down a magic tree.
movieData.tagline: Do you believe in humans?
movieData.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest

title: What Dreams May Come
comment_text:
What Dreams May Come

It's a beautiful representation of the afterlife, even the scary and dark parts are masterfully crafted. To call them anything but beautiful would be an understatement.

movieData.overview: Chris Neilson dies to find himself in a heaven more amazing than he could have ever dreamed of. There is one thing missing: his wife. After he dies, his wife, Annie killed herself and went to hell. Chris decides to risk eternity in hades for the small chance that he will be able to bring her back to heaven.
movieData.tagline: After life there is more. The end is just the beginning.
movieData.title: What Dreams May Come

title: Shawshank Redemption
comment_text: It's a tie between The Shawshank Redemption and Forrest Gump. Any time,any place!

movieData.overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
movieData.tagline: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
movieData.title: The Shawshank Redemption

title: Forrest Gump
comment_text: It's a tie between The Shawshank Redemption and Forrest Gump. Any time,any place!

movieData.overview: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.
movieData.tagline: Life is like a box of chocolates...you never know what you're gonna get.
movieData.title: Forrest Gump

title: The Mummy
comment_text: The Mummy (Brendan Fraser one)

movieData.overview: A group of archaeology students awaken an ancient mummy. After being trapped in a time loop, the only way they can escape, is to defeat the mummy. As the body count rises, it seems the Mummy has to collect the souls of those who woke him to be able to walk the earth - for good.
movieData.tagline: Evil has been unearthed.
movieData.title: Rise of the Mummy

title: Lost in Translation
comment_text: Lost in Translation. It's easy to feel lost in a crowd, and/or in company... Makes those rare, intimate connections all the more meaningful.

movieData.overview: Two lost souls visiting Tokyo -- the young, neglected wife of a photographer and a washed-up movie star shooting a TV commercial -- find an odd solace and pensive freedom to be real in each other's company, away from their lives in America.
movieData.tagline: Everyone wants to be found.
movieData.title: Lost in Translation

title: The Aristocats
comment_text:
The Aristocats
The Road to El Dorado
Big Hero Six

movieData.overview: When Madame Adelaide Bonfamille leaves her fortune to Duchess and her children—Bonfamille’s beloved family of cats—the butler plots to steal the money and kidnaps the legatees, leaving them out on a country road. All seems lost until the wily Thomas O’Malley Cat and his jazz-playing alley cats come to the aristocats’ rescue.
movieData.tagline: A tune-filled animated extravaganza.
movieData.title: The Aristocats

title: The Road to El Dorado
comment_text:
The Aristocats
The Road to El Dorado
Big Hero Six

movieData.overview: After a failed swindle, two con-men end up with a map to El Dorado, the fabled "city of gold," and an unintended trip to the New World.  Much to their surprise, the map does lead the pair to the mythical city, where the startled inhabitants promptly begin to worship them as gods.  The only question is, do they take the worshipful natives for all they're worth, or is there a bit more to El Dorado than riches?
movieData.tagline: They came for the gold. They stayed for the adventure.
movieData.title: The Road to El Dorado

title: Big Hero 6
comment_text:
The Aristocats
The Road to El Dorado
Big Hero Six

title: Tank Girl
comment_text: Tank Girl

movieData.overview: Based on the British cult comic-strip, our tank-riding anti-heroine fights a mega-corporation, which controls the world's water supply.
movieData.tagline: In 2033, justice rides a tank and wears lip gloss.
movieData.title: Tank Girl

title: Rocky Horror Picture Show
comment_text:
Rocky Horror Picture Show

Watched it for the first time in 5th grade and was mesmerized. Has been one of my favs ever since. 

Honorable mention: The Goonies

belongs_to_collection.name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show Collection

movieData.overview: Sweethearts Brad and Janet, stuck with a flat tire during a storm, discover the eerie mansion of Dr. Frank-N-Furter, a transvestite scientist. As their innocence is lost, Brad and Janet meet a houseful of wild characters, including a rocking biker and a creepy butler. Through elaborate dances and rock songs, Frank-N-Furter unveils his latest creation: a muscular man named 'Rocky'.
movieData.tagline: A different set of jaws.
movieData.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show

title: Edward Scissorhands
comment_text: Edward Scissorhands. I watch it every Christmas and it's just so  magical to me. It's simple but deep, you feel for most of the characters. And just hilarious in the smallest ways. The soundtrack and snow too 👌🏽

movieData.overview: A small suburban town receives a visit from a castaway unfinished science experiment named Edward.
movieData.tagline: His scars run deep.
movieData.title: Edward Scissorhands

title: Grandma's Boy
comment_text: Grandma's Boy has something about it that just puts me in a great mood. Idk if it's seen as a good or bad movie, but personally I think it's one of the most fun, feel good movies out there.

movieData.overview: Even though he's 35, Alex acts more like he's 13, spending his days as the world's oldest video game tester and his evenings developing the next big Xbox game. But when he gets kicked out of his apartment, he's forced to move in with his grandmother.
movieData.tagline: A movie that proves you're never too old to come of age.
movieData.title: Grandma's Boy

title: Armageddon
comment_text: Armageddon. My favorite movie of all time even though it may be the most scientificly inaccurate movie of all time.

movieData.overview: When an asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, NASA honcho Dan Truman determines the only way to stop it is to drill into its surface and detonate a nuclear bomb. This leads him to renowned driller Harry Stamper, who agrees to helm the dangerous space mission provided he can bring along his own hotshot crew. Among them is the cocksure A.J. who Harry thinks isn't good enough for his daughter, until the mission proves otherwise.
movieData.tagline: The Earth's Darkest Day Will Be Man's Finest Hour
movieData.title: Armageddon

title: Goodfellas
comment_text: Goodfellas.

movieData.overview: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.
movieData.tagline: Three Decades of Life in the Mafia.
movieData.title: GoodFellas

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
comment_text: 10 Things I Hate About You. I was a teenager when that movie first aired and Kat became my role model for a while, haha.

movieData.overview: On the first day at his new school, Cameron instantly falls for Bianca, the gorgeous girl of his dreams. The only problem is that Bianca is forbidden to date until her ill-tempered, completely un-dateable older sister Kat goes out, too. In an attempt to solve his problem, Cameron singles out the only guy who could possibly be a match for Kat: a mysterious bad boy with a nasty reputation of his own.
movieData.tagline: How do I loathe thee? Let me count the ways.
movieData.title: 10 Things I Hate About You

title: Ghost Dog: Way of The Samurai
comment_text:
Ghost Dog: Way of The Samurai.

It has no business being as great as it is, the premise should be goofy as hell but everything is played perfectly right. It's funny and moving in just the right ways. I never get tired of it.

movieData.original_title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
movieData.overview: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob. Jarmusch's spiritual gangster film tells the story of an inner-city hit man (Whitaker) who lives on a rooftop, training himself as a samurai in the strictest sense. He communicates primarily by carrier pigeon, while remaining loyal to a gangster (Tormey) who once saved his life.
movieData.tagline: Live by the code. Die by the code.
movieData.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai

title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
comment_text:
So I Married an Axe Murderer. 

It just the vibe of the whole thing.  Great music, silly, and light-hearted.

Great characters: I love Charlie's Parents and the Police Chief especially.

movieData.original_title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
movieData.overview: Just after a bad breakup, Charlie MacKenzie falls for lovely butcher Harriet Michaels and introduces her to his parents. But, as voracious consumers of sensational tabloids, his parents soon come to suspect that Harriet is actually a notorious serial killer -- "Mrs. X" -- wanted in connection with a string of bizarre honeymoon killings. Thinking his parents foolish, Charlie proposes to Harriet. But while on his honeymoon with her, he begins to fear they were right.
movieData.tagline: The honeymoon was killer.
movieData.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer

title: Drive
comment_text: Drive

movieData.overview: A getaway driver is attracted to a female neighbor whose husband owes money to a local gangster. As a result he is drawn deeper into a dangerous underworld.
movieData.title: Drive

title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
comment_text: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation. It's such a good movie :))

movieData.overview: It's Christmastime, and the Griswolds are preparing for a family seasonal celebration. But things never run smoothly for Clark, his wife Ellen, and their two kids. Clark's continual bad luck is worsened by his obnoxious family guests, but he manages to keep going, knowing that his Christmas bonus is due soon.
movieData.tagline: Yule crack up.
movieData.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation

title: Amelie
comment_text: Amelie. The color palette of the entire film is just stunning. The score, the plot, the cinematography, it's all so delightful that it makes me feel like I'm stepping into a magical universe.

movieData.overview: A girl struggling with asthma is taken to a clinic in South Tyrol to be cured. After some time she decides to get out of this hell (that's how she feels about it) and soon she'll meet a new friend. Together they try to reach the peak of a mountain where, according to an old custom, she can be healed.
movieData.title: Mountain Miracle

title: Conan the Barbarian
comment_text: 1982 Conan the Barbarian

movieData.overview: A quest that begins as a personal vendetta for the fierce Cimmerian warrior soon turns into an epic battle against hulking rivals, horrific monsters, and impossible odds, as Conan (Jason Momoa) realizes he is the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from an encroaching reign of supernatural evil.
movieData.tagline: Enter an age undreamed of
movieData.title: Conan the Barbarian

title: Jurassic Park
comment_text: Jurassic Park

movieData.overview: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.
movieData.tagline: An adventure 65 million years in the making.
movieData.title: Jurassic Park

title: Bridge to Terabithia
comment_text: Bridge to Terabithia

movieData.overview: Jesse Aarons trained all summer to become the fastest runner in school, so he's very upset when newcomer Leslie Burke outruns him and everyone else. Despite this and other differences, including that she's rich, he's poor, and she's a city girl, he's a country boy, the two become fast friends. Together, they create Terabithia, a land of monsters, trolls, ogres, and giants and rule as king and queen.
movieData.tagline: Close your eyes, but keep your mind wide open.
movieData.title: Bridge to Terabithia

title: Robin Hood
comment_text: Disney's animated Robin Hood

movieData.overview: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.
movieData.tagline: The legend you know. The story you don't.
movieData.title: Robin Hood

title: The secret garden
comment_text: The secret garden

movieData.overview: Mary Lennox is born in India to wealthy British parents who never wanted her. When her parents suddenly die, she is sent back to England to live with her uncle. She meets her sickly cousin, and the two children find a wondrous secret garden lost in the grounds of Misselthwaite Manor.
movieData.title: The Secret Garden

title: Heathers
comment_text: Heathers. Makes me nostalgic for a time I was never alive in.

movieData.overview: A girl who halfheartedly tries to be part of the "in crowd" of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics: by killing the popular kids.
movieData.tagline: Best friends, social trends, and occasional murder.
movieData.title: Heathers

title: Robocop
comment_text: Robocop

movieData.overview: In a violent, near-apocalyptic Detroit, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products wins a contract from the city government to privatize the police force. To test their crime-eradicating cyborgs, the company leads street cop Alex Murphy into an armed confrontation with crime lord Boddicker so they can use his body to support their untested RoboCop prototype. But when RoboCop learns of the company's nefarious plans, he turns on his masters.
movieData.tagline: Part man. Part machine. All cop. The future of law enforcement.
movieData.title: RoboCop

title: Anne of Green Gables
comment_text: The CBC Anne of Green Gables miniseries/movie; turns me into putty. The book is just better-than-average series fiction for tweens, the movie is magic.

movieData.overview: At the turn of the century on Prince Edward Island, Matthew Cuthbert and his sister Marilla decide to take on an orphan boy as help for their farm. But they get an unexpected jolt when they're mistakenly sent a girl instead: Anne Shirley. Anne's a dreamer with an unusual point of view, far removed from Marilla's pragmatic ways, and it's only on trial that Marilla agrees to keep Anne.
movieData.title: Anne of Green Gables

title: Platoon
comment_text:
Platoon. 

Saw it 50-60 times in High School, just something about it that I love.

movieData.overview: As a young and naive recruit in Vietnam, Chris Taylor faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.
movieData.tagline: The first casualty of war is innocence.
movieData.title: Platoon

title: The Fifth Element
comment_text: The Fifth Element, its ridiculous and campy and exactly what every good scifi should be. getting a Modoshawan tattooed on me in a couple months

movieData.overview: In 2257, a taxi driver is unintentionally given the task of saving a young girl who is part of the key that will ensure the survival of humanity.
movieData.tagline: There is no future without it.
movieData.title: The Fifth Element

title: True Lies
comment_text: True Lies, lots of fun twists..   "What kind of sick bitch takes the ice cube trays out of the freezer!"

movieData.overview: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.
movieData.tagline: When he said I do, he never said what he did.
movieData.title: True Lies

title: Flight of the Navigator
comment_text:
Flight of the Navigator.

I remember watching this a kid and fell in love with it.

Watched it a few days ago and loved it as much as I did the first time I saw it.

movieData.overview: 12-year-old David is accidentally knocked out in the forest near his home, but when he awakens eight years have passed. His family is overjoyed to have him back, but is just as perplexed as he is that he hasn't aged. When a NASA scientist discovers a UFO nearby, David gets the chance to unravel the mystery and recover the life he lost.
movieData.tagline: Come along on the greatest adventure of the summer!
movieData.title: Flight of the Navigator

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
comment_text:
Kiki's Delivery Service

Every time I bring it up, people have never seen it or say they hate it and it's overrated

movieData.overview: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.
movieData.tagline: I was feeling blue, but I'm better now.
movieData.title: Kiki's Delivery Service

title: O Brother Where Art Thou
comment_text: O Brother Where Art Thou

movieData.overview: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them. On their journey they come across many comical characters and incredible situations. Based upon Homer's 'Odyssey'.
movieData.tagline: They have a plan... but not a clue.
movieData.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?

title: Ghostbusters
comment_text: Ghostbusters (1984), I was 7 when that came out & still watch it as if it just came out yesterday

movieData.overview: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.
movieData.tagline: Who You Gonna Call?
movieData.title: Ghostbusters

title: Big Fish

title: Room
comment_text: Room (2015), i know its not an unpopular movie but every time i see it i am in awe of the acting, and the beauty and raw emotion. I read the book, they are different, but the concept of a five year old learning that the world goes FAR beyond the four walls around him, and experiencing new concepts that are as simple as a shower and stairs, is so beautiful, and so hard to watch at the same time. I adore that movie.

hated by many loved by me.

title: To Wong Foo, Thanks For Everything!

movieData.original_title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
movieData.overview: Three New York drag queens on their way to Hollywood for a beauty pageant get stranded in a small Midwestern town for the entire weekend when their car breaks down. title: Big Fish
comment_text: Big Fish and Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.  Big Fish is just obvious, pure magic and part of its appeal is that it is simply unbelievable.  In my opinion, it's one of the best pieces of art ever created.  Eternal Sunshine, though, has some draw that I can't describe, like I saw something very rare that few people will ever get to see (see, I can't describe it).  Every time I hear that Beck song from the closing credits, I almost feel that magic butterfly-tingle from the first time falling in love or something.

movieData.overview: Throughout his life Edward Bloom has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales. In his later years, he remains a huge mystery to his son, William. Now, to get to know the real man, Will begins piecing together a true picture of his father from flashbacks of his amazing adventures.
movieData.tagline: An adventure as big as life itself.
movieData.title: Big Fish

Eternal Sunshine, though, has some draw that I can't describe, like I saw something very rare that few people will ever get to see (see, I can't describe it). movieData.original_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movieData.overview: Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realises that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.
movieData.tagline: You can erase someone from your mind. Getting them out of your heart is another story.

title: Secondhand Lions
comment_text:
*Secondhand Lions*.  It's all about the lived heroic male experience, outside the normal shoot-em-up stuff most movies portray.  Robert Duvall and Michael Caine play aging heroes; Haley Joel Osment plays a 12-year-old kid abandoned to them by a deadbeat mom.  

All three delivered really incredible performances.  It is to film sort of what "Cannery Row" is to the written word:  a gentle and loving look at what motivates truly adventurous and/or bizarre people.  I've seen it a half a dozen times -- it always transports me.

movieData.overview: "Secondhand Lions" follows the comedic adventures of an introverted boy left on the doorstep of a pair of reluctant, eccentric great-uncles, whose exotic remembrances stir the boy's spirit and re-ignite the men's lives.
movieData.title: Secondhand Lions

title: Beetlejuice
comment_text:
Beetlejuice! 

Keaton was phenomenal in that movie, and that MUSIC \*chills\* Just hearing the intro song makes me giddy!

movieData.overview: Thanks to an untimely demise via drowning, a young couple end up as poltergeists in their New England farmhouse, where they fail to meet the challenge of scaring away the insufferable new owners, who want to make drastic changes. In desperation, the undead newlyweds turn to an expert frightmeister, but he's got a diabolical agenda of his own.
movieData.tagline: The afterlife isn't that bad after all...
movieData.title: Beetlejuice

title: 101 dalmations
comment_text: 101 dalmations the animated versions

movieData.overview: Being one of 101 takes its toll on Patch, who doesn't feel unique. When he's accidentally left behind on moving day, he meets his idol, Thunderbolt, who enlists him on a publicity campaign.
movieData.tagline: A new hero unleashed.
movieData.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure

title: Children of Men
comment_text:
Children of Men

I'll never be able to experience it for the first time again, but it's the best time I've ever had watching a movie for the first time.  I went to theatre only knowing that it was a dystopian sci-fi.  I had no clue of the plot, no clue it was based on a book, nothing.  When the huge revelation is revealed I was absolutely floored.  My jaw literally hung open and I was literally on the edge of my seat, captivated. I'd never felt like that before while watching a film.  And then the climatic scene, when everything stops as they walk past all the soldiers brought tears, and a sense of absolute awe.  Just an incredible, incredible film.

movieData.overview: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which humans can no longer procreate, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea, where her child's birth may help scientists save the future of humankind.
movieData.tagline: The future's a thing of the past.
movieData.title: Children of Men

title: The Sound of Music

title: Xanadu

title: Babe
comment_text: Babe. :') It is truly a masterpiece.

movieData.overview: Babe is a little pig who doesn't quite know his place in the world. With a bunch of odd friends, like Ferdinand the duck who thinks he is a rooster and Fly the dog he calls mum, Babe realises that he has the makings to become the greatest sheep pig of all time, and Farmer Hogget knows it. With the help of the sheep dogs, Babe learns that a pig can be anything that he wants to be.
movieData.tagline: A little pig goes a long way.
movieData.title: Babe

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit?
comment_text:
*Who Framed Roger Rabbit?*

The creative presentation of an entire fantasy world that combined elegantly with our own real world.  The storytelling.  The crafting of each personality, not just from the human actors, but the toons.

Even the backstory, including the phenomenal effort to put together a movie production with both Disney and Warner Brothers cartoon characters, let alone a handful from other studios.

It's an amazing work, and as a bonus, has aged pretty well, too.

movieData.overview: 'Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But the stakes are quickly raised when Marvin Acme is found dead and Roger is the prime suspect.
movieData.tagline: It's the story of a man, a woman, and a rabbit in a triangle of trouble.
movieData.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit

title: Kung Fu Hustle
comment_text: Kung Fu Hustle. It displays a great message of chasing dreams, staying true to ones self and never giving up despite the odds. A lot of people hate on it because of the bad dubbing but that's just how Stephen Chow directs his comedy. He's intentionally making fun of it. Also you try to match English to Mandarin and get back to me with the results lol.

movieData.overview: Set in Canton, China in the 1940s, the story revolves in a town ruled by the Axe Gang, Sing who desperately wants to become a member. He stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords who turns out to be the greatest kung-fu masters in disguise. Sing's actions eventually cause the Axe Gang and the slumlords to engage in an explosive kung-fu battle. Only one side will win and only one hero will emerge as the greatest kung-fu master of all.
movieData.tagline: So many gangsters...so little time.
movieData.title: Kung Fu Hustle

title: Dazed and Confused
comment_text:
Dazed and Confused. 

I didn't grow up during that time, but the vibe of that movie reminds me so much of my days in highschool.  It always gives me flashbacks of good times.

movieData.overview: The adventures of a group of Texas teens on their last day of school in 1976, centering on student Randall Floyd, who moves easily among stoners, jocks and geeks. Floyd is a star athlete, but he also likes smoking weed, which presents a conundrum when his football coach demands he sign a "no drugs" pledge.
movieData.tagline: See it with a bud.
movieData.title: Dazed and Confused

title: Desperado
comment_text: Desperado. One of the best action movies to come out of the 90s. Antonio Banderas had a special action hero style.

movieData.overview: El Mariachi, a musician, arrives in a Mexican town and is mistaken as a hit-man. He runs into trouble with a local drug lord and seeks to avenge the death of his lover.
movieData.tagline: When the smoke clears, it just means he's reloading.
movieData.title: Desperado

title: The Royal Tenenbaums
comment_text: The Royal Tenenbaums. I love most of Wes Anderson's movies, but this one was the first one I saw, and IMO has the most rewatchability. It's creative and strange and different from anything else I'd seen. It has uncomfortable moments and characters you empathize with who you wouldn't expect to. A great exploration of family dysfunction and trauma and the difficulties we go through as we try to cope. At the end when Ben Stiller says “I've had a rough year, dad” waterfalls. Every time.

movieData.overview: Royal Tenenbaum and his wife Etheline had three children and then they separated. All three children are extraordinary --- all geniuses. Virtually all memory of the brilliance of the young Tenenbaums was subsequently erased by two decades of betrayal, failure, and disaster. Most of this was generally considered to be their father's fault. "The Royal Tenenbaums" is the story of the family's sudden, unexpected reunion one recent winter.
movieData.tagline: Family Isn't A Word ... It's A Sentence.
movieData.title: The Royal Tenenbaums

title: Your name
comment_text: Your name. Yes it's popular among anime lovers, but anyone else I suggested to watch it did not really like it.

movieData.overview: J.J. Abrams and Paramount Pictures have announced they’ll be turning the critically acclaimed Japanese anime Your Name into a live-action film.
movieData.title: Your Name

title: Face/Off
comment_text: Face/Off. An exercise in 90's action excess. Quintessential unhinged Nic Cage and Travolta trying to match his crazy.

movieData.overview: Sean Archer, a very tough, rugged FBI Agent. Who is still grieving for his dead son Michael. Archer believes that his son's killer is his sworn enemy, a very powerful criminal, Castor Troy. One day, Archer has finally cornered Castor, however, their fight has knocked out Troy cold. As Archer finally breathes easy over the capture of his enemy, he finds out that Troy has planted a bomb that will destroy the entire city of Los Angeles and all of its inhabitants. Unfortunately the only other person who knows its location is Castor's brother Pollux, and he refuses to talk. The solution, a special operation doctor that can cut off people's faces, and can place a person's face onto another person. Archer undergoes one of those surgeries to talk to Pollux. However, Castor Troy somehow regains consciousness and now wants revenge on Archer for taking his face. Not only is Troy ruining Archer's mission, but his personal life as well. Archer must stop Troy again. This time, it's personal.
movieData.tagline: In order to catch him, he must become him.
movieData.title: Face/Off

title: Fight club
comment_text: Fight club.

movieData.tagline: Mischief. Mayhem. Soap.

comment_text: Tucker and dale vs the forces of evil

title: The Wizard of Oz
comment_text: The Wizard of Oz. I'm a 37 years old and am obsessed with this movie. When I was a kid my grandmother had it on VHS and I ALWAYS had to watch it when I went to her house. And I was always super stoked when Dorothy lands in OZ and everything goes from black and white to color. My mom gave me a collector's DVD set some time ago that have 6 or 7 disks with tons of interviews with cast members and other people involved with the making of the movie. I don't have that box set anymore because I got rid of my DVD collection like 7 years ago but I make a point to watch it at least once a year.

movieData.overview: Young Dorothy finds herself in a magical world where she makes friends with a lion, a scarecrow and a tin man as they make their way along the yellow brick road to talk with the Wizard and ask for the things they miss most in their lives. The Wicked Witch of the West is the only thing that could stop them.
movieData.tagline: We're off to see the Wizard, the wonderful Wizard of Oz!
movieData.title: The Wizard of Oz

title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
comment_text: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou and Moulin Rouge. I want to live in those places, do those things(well not *all* those things) and have those friends

movieData.original_title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
movieData.overview: Renowned oceanographer Steve Zissou has sworn vengeance upon the rare shark that devoured a member of his crew. In addition to his regular team, he is joined on his boat by Ned, a man who believes Zissou to be his father, and Jane, a journalist pregnant by a married man. They travel the sea, all too often running into pirates and, perhaps more traumatically, various figures from Zissou's past, including his estranged wife, Eleanor.
movieData.tagline: The deeper you go, the weirder life gets.
movieData.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou

title: Moulin Rouge

movieData.overview: A celebration of love and creative inspiration takes place in the infamous, gaudy and glamorous Parisian nightclub, at the cusp of the 20th century. A young poet, who is plunged into the heady world of Moulin Rouge, begins a passionate affair with the club's most notorious and beautiful star.
movieData.tagline: No Laws. No Limits. One Rule. Never Fall In Love.
movieData.title: Moulin Rouge!

title: The Never-ending Story
comment_text: The Never-ending Story makes me feel like the child I was when I first watched it, every single time.

movieData.overview: Follows the changing love lives of college buddies KK and Ronnie, with their girlfriends/wives May and Candy. Workaholic adman KK and his girlfriend May are going through a tough time. They attend Ronnie’s wedding, where KK meets Ronnie’s cousin Candy. KK hires Candy as a secretary on Ronnie’s urging, and the two drift together. Meanwhile, Ronnie’s marriage fails, and he gets together with May….
movieData.title: The Never Ending Love Story

title: Hot Fuzz
comment_text: Hot Fuzz.

movieData.overview: As a former London constable, Nicholas Angel finds it difficult to adapt to his new assignment in the sleepy British village of Sandford. Not only does he miss the excitement of the big city, but he also has a well-meaning oaf for a partner. However, when a series of grisly accidents rocks Sandford, Angel smells something rotten in the idyllic village.
movieData.tagline: Big cops. Small town. Moderate violence.
movieData.title: Hot Fuzz

title: The Princess Bride
comment_text: The Princess Bride

movieData.overview: In this enchantingly cracked fairy tale, the beautiful Princess Buttercup and the dashing Westley must overcome staggering odds to find happiness amid six-fingered swordsmen, murderous princes, Sicilians and rodents of unusual size. But even death can't stop these true lovebirds from triumphing.
movieData.tagline: It's as real as the feelings you feel.
movieData.title: The Princess Bride

title: Hercules
comment_text:
Hercules.
The cartoon not the actual movie. For some reason as a kid i loved it so much and I still go back to it from time to time.

movieData.overview: Bestowed with superhuman strength, a young mortal named Hercules sets out to prove himself a hero in the eyes of his father, the great god Zeus. Along with his friends Pegasus, a flying horse, and Phil, a personal trainer, Hercules is tricked by the hilarious, hotheaded villain Hades, who's plotting to take over Mount Olympus!
movieData.tagline: Zero to Hero!
movieData.title: Hercules

title: Matilda
comment_text: Matilda

movieData.overview: An extraordinarily intelligent young girl from a cruel and uncaring family discovers she possesses telekinetic powers and is sent off to a school headed by a tyrannical principal.
movieData.tagline: A little magic goes a long way.
movieData.title: Matilda

title: The Emperor's New Groove
comment_text: The Emperor's New Groove.

movieData.overview: Kuzco is a self-centered emperor who summons Pacha from a village and to tell him that his home will be destroyed to make room for Kuzco's new summer home. Kuzco's advisor, Yzma, tries to poison Kuzco and accidentally turns him into a llama, who accidentally ends up in Pacha's village. Pacha offers to help Kuzco if he doesn't destroy his house, and so they form an unlikely partnership.
movieData.tagline: It's all about... ME!
movieData.title: The Emperor's New Groove

title: Point Break
comment_text:
Point Break.

Keanu and Swayze are peak Keanu and Swayze. There's love, brotherhood, betrayal, sacrifice and fate. It's a beautiful movie.

movieData.overview: A young undercover FBI agent infiltrates a gang of thieves who share a common interest in extreme sports. A remake of the 1991 film, "Point Break".
movieData.tagline: The only law that matters is gravity
movieData.title: Point Break

title: Rudy
comment_text: Rudy, as a kid who was picked on in my younger years believing I couldn't do anything that story really stuck with me. I haven't watched it in years but still one of my favorites none-the-less

movieData.overview: Rudy grew up in a steel mill town where most people ended up working, but wanted to play football at Notre Dame instead. There were only a couple of problems. His grades were a little low, his athletic skills were poor, and he was only half the size of the other players. But he had the drive and the spirit of 5 people and has set his sights upon joining the team.
movieData.tagline: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, It's the size of the fight in the dog.
movieData.title: Rudy

title: Field of Dreams
comment_text: Field of Dreams

movieData.overview: Ray Kinsella is an Iowa farmer who hears a mysterious voice telling him to turn his cornfield into a baseball diamond. He does, but the voice's directions don't stop -- even after the spirits of deceased ballplayers turn up to play.
movieData.tagline: If you believe the impossible, the incredible can come true.
movieData.title: Field of Dreams

title: Hook
comment_text: Hook

movieData.overview: The boy who wasn't supposed grow up—Peter Pan—does just that, becoming a soulless corporate lawyer whose workaholism could cost him his wife and kids. During his trip to see Granny Wendy in London, the vengeful Capt. Hook kidnaps Peter's kids and forces Peter to return to Neverland.
movieData.tagline: What if Peter Pan grew up?
movieData.title: Hook

title: E.T.
comment_text: E.T.

movieData.overview: After a gentle alien becomes stranded on Earth, the being is discovered and befriended by a young boy named Elliott. Bringing the extraterrestrial into his suburban California house, Elliott introduces E.T., as the alien is dubbed, to his brother and his little sister, Gertie, and the children decide to keep its existence a secret. Soon, however, E.T. falls ill, resulting in government intervention and a dire situation for both Elliott and the alien.
movieData.tagline: He is afraid. He is alone. He is three million light years from home.
movieData.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

title: The Goonies
comment_text: The Goonies

movieData.overview: A young teenager named Mikey Walsh finds an old treasure map in his father's attic. Hoping to save their homes from demolition, Mikey and his friends Data Wang, Chunk Cohen, and Mouth Devereaux run off on a big quest to find the secret stash of Pirate One-Eyed Willie.
movieData.title: The Goonies

title: The princess bride
comment_text: The princess bride

movieData.overview: In this enchantingly cracked fairy tale, the beautiful Princess Buttercup and the dashing Westley must overcome staggering odds to find happiness amid six-fingered swordsmen, murderous princes, Sicilians and rodents of unusual size. But even death can't stop these true lovebirds from triumphing.
movieData.tagline: It's as real as the feelings you feel.
movieData.title: The Princess Bride

title: Secret life of Walter Mitty
comment_text: Secret life of Walter Mitty

movieData.original_title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
movieData.overview: A timid magazine photo manager who lives life vicariously through daydreams embarks on a true-life adventure when a negative goes missing.
movieData.tagline: Stop Dreaming, Start Living
movieData.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

title: Army of Darkness
comment_text: Army of Darkness

movieData.overview: Ash is transported back to medieval days, where he is captured by the dreaded Lord Arthur. Aided by the deadly chainsaw that has become his only friend, Ash is sent on a perilous mission to recover the Book of the Dead, a powerful tome that gives its owner the power to summon an army of ghouls.
movieData.tagline: Trapped in time. Surrounded by evil. Low on gas.
movieData.title: Army of Darkness

title: 28 Days Later
comment_text: 28 Days Later. It's a zombie movie done right in every aspect, and the acting is brilliant. I genuinely felt Cillian's emotions throughout the film with the way that the directing portrayed them.

movieData.overview: Twenty-eight days after a killer virus was accidentally unleashed from a British research facility, a small group of London survivors are caught in a desperate struggle to protect themselves from the infected. Carried by animals and humans, the virus turns those it infects into homicidal maniacs -- and it's absolutely impossible to contain.
movieData.tagline: His fear began when he woke up alone. His terror began when he realised he wasn't.
movieData.title: 28 Days Later

title: Polar Express
comment_text: Polar Express

movieData.overview: When a doubting young boy takes an extraordinary train ride to the North Pole, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery that shows him that the wonder of life never fades for those who believe.
movieData.tagline: This holiday season... believe.
movieData.title: The Polar Express

title: Neverending Story
comment_text: Neverending Story.. FAAAAALCOOORRRR

movieData.overview: A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.
movieData.tagline: It's a brand new beginning in the adventure that never ends
movieData.title: The NeverEnding Story III

title: Heavy Weights
comment_text: Heavy Weights. Holds up well, still fucking hilarious. Plus I love Judd Apatow and it was the first big thing he ever wrote.

movieData.overview: Camp Hope is a summer retreat for overweight boys run by a kindly couple who make the campers feel comfortable with their extra pounds. But when tyrannical fitness guru Tony buys the camp, he puts the kids on a cruel regimen that goes too far. Sick of the endless weeks of "all work and no play," the kids stage a coup and reclaim their summer of fun.
movieData.tagline: They don't run the fastest. They don't jump the highest. But they sure are getting the last laugh. Heavyweights. They never met a hot dog they didn't like ... until now.
movieData.title: Heavyweights

title: The Princess Bride
comment_text: The Princess Bride

movieData.overview: In this enchantingly cracked fairy tale, the beautiful Princess Buttercup and the dashing Westley must overcome staggering odds to find happiness amid six-fingered swordsmen, murderous princes, Sicilians and rodents of unusual size. But even death can't stop these true lovebirds from triumphing.
movieData.tagline: It's as real as the feelings you feel.
movieData.title: The Princess Bride

title: About Time
comment_text:
I'm late to the party, but I'd say "About Time".

I just love the movie, and it hits completely different after having a kid and makes me love it in a different way.

movieData.overview: The night after another unsatisfactory New Year party, Tim's father tells his son that the men in his family have always had the ability to travel through time. Tim can't change history, but he can change what happens and has happened in his own life – so he decides to make his world a better place... by getting a girlfriend. Sadly, that turns out not to be as easy as he thinks.
movieData.tagline: What if every moment in life came with a second chance?
movieData.title: About Time

title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
comment_text: I'm Gonna Git Ya Sucka ...my favourite movie since I was a little kid , I've played for friends who look at me like wtf is this . You can't go wrong with a comedic blaxploitation movie... and every black super hero needs a theme song

movieData.overview: Jack Spade returns from the army in his old ghetto neighbourhood when his brother, June Bug, dies. Jack declares war on Mr. Big, powerful local crimelord. His army is led by John Slade, his childhood idol who used to fight bad guys in the 70s.
movieData.tagline: It's Tough To Be A Black Hero.
movieData.title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka

title: Guardians of Gahoole
comment_text:
Guardians of Gahoole.

Man that animation rivals today's Pixar, and it's around a decade old.

movieData.original_title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
movieData.overview: Soren, a young barn owl, is kidnapped by owls of St. Aggie's, ostensibly an orphanage, where owlets are brainwashed into becoming soldiers. He and his new friends escape to the island of Ga'Hoole, to assist its noble, wise owls who fight the army being created by the wicked rulers of St. Aggie's. The film is based on the first three books in the series.
movieData.tagline: On his way to finding a legend...he will become one.
movieData.title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole

title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
comment_text: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day. Most people haven't even HEARD of it, much less seen it, but it's just...perfect. A darling little jewelbox of a film, beautifully cast and costumed, funny and zany, and yet it's anchored by real, deep emotion and the acknowledgement of hardship and powerlessness in both poverty and war. It's amazing.

movieData.original_title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
movieData.overview: London, England, on the eve of World War II. Guinevere Pettigrew, a strict governess who is unable to keep a job, is fired again. Lost in the hostile city, a series of fortunate circumstances lead her to meet Delysia LaFosse, a glamorous and dazzling American jazz singer whose life is a chaos ruled by indecision, a continuous battle between love and fame.
movieData.tagline: Every woman will have her day
movieData.title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day

title: Transformers Movie
comment_text: The 1986 Transformers Movie

movieData.overview: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet-consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.
movieData.tagline: Beyond good. Beyond evil. Beyond your wildest imagination.
movieData.title: The Transformers: The Movie

title: Death to Smoochy
comment_text:
Death to Smoochy. 

Full disclosure, worked in a similar children's entertainment environment, so it spoke directly to my soul. Also, Robin Williams was just amazing with how unhinged his character was. But the whole cast and their performances are hilarious.

movieData.overview: Tells the story of Rainbow Randolph, the corrupt, costumed star of a popular children's TV show, who is fired over a bribery scandal and replaced by squeaky-clean Smoochy, a puffy fuscia rhinoceros. As Smoochy catapults to fame - scoring hit ratings and the affections of a network executive - Randolph makes the unsuspecting rhino the target of his numerous outrageous attempts to exact revenge and reclaim his status as America's sweetheart.
movieData.tagline: Get ready for an unexpected hit.
movieData.title: Death to Smoochy

title: Muriel's Wedding
comment_text:
Muriel's Wedding. 

My wife and I saw it in one of the independent small run theatres locally and just adored it. We eventually got it on VHS and constantly are quoting it to each other. “You're useless Muriel!” “Deirdre, fancy seeing you here!”

movieData.overview: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.
movieData.tagline: Success is the best revenge.
movieData.title: Muriel's Wedding

title: Wimbledon
comment_text: Wimbledon

movieData.overview: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.
movieData.tagline: She's the golden girl. He's the longshot. It's a match made in...
movieData.title: Wimbledon

title: Clue
comment_text: Clue (1985)

movieData.overview: Clue finds six colorful dinner guests gathered at the mansion of their host, Mr. Boddy -- who turns up dead after his secret is exposed: He was blackmailing all of them. With the killer among them, the guests and Boddy's chatty butler must suss out the culprit before the body count rises.
movieData.tagline: Seven Suspects, Six Weapons, Five Bodies and Three Endings.
movieData.title: Clue

title: Sleepy Hollow
comment_text: Sleepy Hallow just feels like fall to me. I could live inside the opening credits scene forever.

movieData.overview: New York detective Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate a series of mysterious deaths in which the victims are found beheaded. Locals believe the culprit to be none other than the legendary Headless Horseman.
movieData.tagline: Heads will roll.
movieData.title: Sleepy Hollow

title: The Adventures of *Buckaroo Banzai* Across the 8th Dimension
comment_text: The Adventures of *Buckaroo Banzai* Across the 8th Dimension

movieData.original_title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
movieData.overview: Adventurer/surgeon/rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his band of men, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, take on evil alien invaders from the 8th dimension.
movieData.tagline: Beings from Another Dimension have invaded your world.
movieData.title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension

title: Death Becomes Her
comment_text: Death Becomes Her and Deadpool. Oh, and Best Little Whorehouse in Texas.

movieData.overview: Madeline is married to Ernest, who was once arch-rival Helen's fiance. After recovering from a mental breakdown, Helen vows to kill Madeline and steal back Ernest. Unfortunately for everyone, the introduction of a magic potion causes things to be a great deal more complicated than a mere murder plot.
movieData.tagline: In one small bottle... The fountain of youth. The secret of eternal life. The power of an ancient potion. Sometimes it works... sometimes it doesn't.
movieData.title: Death Becomes Her

title: Deadpool
comment_text: Death Becomes Her and Deadpool. Oh, and Best Little Whorehouse in Texas.

movieData.overview: Deadpool tells the origin story of former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.
movieData.tagline: Witness the beginning of a happy ending
movieData.title: Deadpool

title: Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
comment_text: Death Becomes Her and Deadpool. Oh, and Best Little Whorehouse in Texas.

movieData.original_title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
movieData.overview: The town sheriff and a madame team up to stop a television evangelist from shutting down the local whorehouse, the famed "Chicken Ranch."
movieData.tagline: With Burt and Dolly this much fun just couldn't be legal!
movieData.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas

title: The Boondock Saints
comment_text: The Boondock Saints. It's just so good!

movieData.overview: Tired of the crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers Conner and Murphy are inspired by their faith to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of zealous vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community. But Paul Smecker, an eccentric FBI agent, is fast closing in on their blood-soaked trail.
movieData.tagline: Thy Kingdom Come. Thy Will Be Done.
movieData.title: The Boondock Saints

title: Practical Magic
comment_text: Practical Magic. I used to watch it with my mother every Halloween. The story is bonkers and not at all kid-friendly (though does feature family strongly) and every time anyone even mentions it I am immediately brought back to being in my Mom's arms and thinking of magic.

movieData.overview: Sally and Gillian Owens, born into a magical family, have mostly avoided witchcraft themselves. But when Gillian's vicious boyfriend, Jimmy Angelov, dies unexpectedly, the Owens sisters give themselves a crash course in hard magic. With policeman Gary Hallet growing suspicious, the girls struggle to resurrect Angelov -- and unwittingly inject his corpse with an evil spirit that threatens to end their family line.
movieData.tagline: For two sisters from a family of witches, falling in love is the trickiest spell of all.
movieData.title: Practical Magic

title: Galaxy Quest
comment_text: Galaxy Quest

movieData.overview: For four years, the courageous crew of the NSEA protector - "Commander Peter Quincy Taggart" (Tim Allen), "Lt. Tawny Madison (Sigourney Weaver) and "Dr.Lazarus" (Alan Rickman) - set off on a thrilling and often dangerous mission in space...and then their series was cancelled! Now, twenty years later, aliens under attack have mistaken the Galaxy Quest television transmissions for "historical documents" and beam up the crew of has-been actors to save the universe. With no script, no director and no clue, the actors must turn in the performances of their lives.
movieData.tagline: A comedy of Galactic Proportions.
movieData.title: Galaxy Quest

title: Fifth element
comment_text: Fifth element! So love that film.

movieData.overview: In 2257, a taxi driver is unintentionally given the task of saving a young girl who is part of the key that will ensure the survival of humanity.
movieData.tagline: There is no future without it.
movieData.title: The Fifth Element

title: Mars attacks
comment_text:
Mars attacks


ACK ACK

movieData.overview: 'We come in peace' is not what those green men from Mars mean when they invade our planet, armed with irresistible weapons and a cruel sense of humor.  This star studded cast must play victim to the alien’s fun and games in this comedy homage to science fiction films of the '50s and '60s.
movieData.tagline: Nice planet. We'll take it!
movieData.title: Mars Attacks!

title: Spaceballs
comment_text: Spaceballs. Still laugh 20 years later.

movieData.overview: When the nefarious Dark Helmet hatches a plan to snatch Princess Vespa and steal her planet's air, space-bum-for-hire Lone Starr and his clueless sidekick fly to the rescue. Along the way, they meet Yogurt, who puts Lone Starr wise to the power of "The Schwartz." Can he master it in time to save the day?
movieData.tagline: May the schwartz be with you.
movieData.title: Spaceballs

title: The mummy
comment_text: The mummy .. if you dont love Brendan we cant be friends

movieData.overview: A group of archaeology students awaken an ancient mummy. After being trapped in a time loop, the only way they can escape, is to defeat the mummy. As the body count rises, it seems the Mummy has to collect the souls of those who woke him to be able to walk the earth - for good.
movieData.tagline: Evil has been unearthed.
movieData.title: Rise of the Mummy

title: No Country For Old Men
comment_text: No Country For Old Men

movieData.overview: Llewelyn Moss stumbles upon dead bodies, $2 million and a hoard of heroin in a Texas desert, but methodical killer Anton Chigurh comes looking for it, with local sheriff Ed Tom Bell hot on his trail. The roles of prey and predator blur as the violent pursuit of money and justice collide.
movieData.tagline: There are no clean getaways.
movieData.title: No Country for Old Men
